Jairo is a 58-year-old man with 3 dependent children. Due to the economic conditions in which he finds himself, he wants to start a food business in order to cover basic household expenses.

Jairo's dream is to improve the condition of his house.

With the loan, he will buy a food truck and stock it with supplies to prepare food.

You can support this dream, make a loan.

loans.use: to buy a food truck and stock it with supplies to prepare food

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
Marleny una señora con 55 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos mayores, trabaja vendiendo mercancía en Medellín, un medio por el cual ella logra cubrir las necesidades básicas de su hogar.
Laborando 7 días a la semana 8 horas cada uno

El sueño de esta señora es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, ya que su estado no es el mejor

Ella solicito un préstamo con el cual comprara vitrinas para el negocio y lo surtirá con variedad de productos.

Aporta a l sueño de Marleny y haga aun préstamo.
texts.en:
María Marleny is a 55 year old woman. She is married and the mother of two older children. She works selling commodities in Medellín, a means by which she manages to cover the basic needs of her home. She works 7 days a week, 8 hours a day. Her dream is to improve her home's conditions because it is not in the best state. She is asking for a loan with which she will buy showcases for the business and she will fill them with a variety of products. 
Support María Marleny's dream and make a loan.

loans.use: to buy showcases for the business and she will fill them with a variety of products.

loans.name: Marie Chantal

texts.en:
Marie Chantal is 39 years old. She is married with two children, aged 7 and 10 years. They both go to school. She owns a shop, and she has been in business for the past three years, while her husband is also a businessman.

With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is 32 years old. She is married with three children aged between 10 and 11 years. They all go to school. She owns a shop, and she has been in business for the past three years, while her husband is also a businessman.

With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, soap, and rice to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, soap, and rice to sell.

loans.name: Philomene

texts.en:
Philomene is 63 years old. She is married with six children aged between 21 and 32 years. Two of them go to school.

She owns a restaurant and has been in business for the past 15 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans, bananas, and meat for making food to sell.

The profits from the business will be used to make savings and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more beans, bananas, and meat for making food to sell.

loans.name: Francine

texts.en:
Francine is 39 years old. She is married with two children, aged 7 and 9 years. Both of them go to school. She owns a shop, and she has been in business for the past year, while her husband is also a businessman.

With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, biscuits, and soap to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more rice, biscuits, and soap to sell.

loans.name: Jose Rodrigo

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.

Tiene un pequeño negocio en el que vende cierta cantidad de mercancía. Inicio el negocio hace 15 años y ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.

El desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para darse la oportunidad de ser mas prospero. 
El dinero será invertido en la compra de mercancía con la que actualmente no cuenta como sombreros, pavas, camisetas.

Tiene grandes esperanzas en su negocio y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de entidades como Interactuar que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.
texts.en: Jose is a man with both feet facing forward to take on the world and he has a wonderful life thanks to his efforts. He has a small business where he sells a limited quantity of merchandise. He began his business 15 years ago and has a good reputation in the area. He wishes to expand his product line and improve his sales thus injecting capital into his business. Therefore he seeks a loan to give himself the opportunity to be more prosperous. The money will be used  to buy merchandise that he currently doesn't have such as hats and t-shirts  He has great aspirations for his business and is thinking that in the future he can improve it considerably thanks to the support of organizations such as Interactuar, which make it possible for people to dream of a better and more stable life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise that he currently doesn't have such as hats and t-shirts

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en:
Alphonsine is 37 years old. She is married with five children aged between 7 months and 11 years. Three of them go to school.

She sells domestic animals and has been in business for the past five years, while her husband is a farmer. With the loan, she would like to buy more goats and sheep for sale.

The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children and make savings in the same business.

loans.use: to buy more goats and sheep for sale.

loans.name: Verena

texts.en:
Verena is 35 years old. She is married with 7 children aged between 9 months and 13 years. 6 of her children go to school. 

Verena owns a butcher shop, which she has been running for the past 2 years, while her husband is a businessman. 

With her loan, Verena would like to buy more meat to resell. The profits from her business will be used to pay her children's school fees. She also plans to save for a similar business.

loans.use: to buy more meat to resell.

loans.name: Luis Hernan

texts.es:
A sus 57 años, Luis tiene mucha energía y empuje para trabajar en su negocio de jardinería en el municipio de Medellín.

Vive en una humilde casa con su compañera sentimental y es padre de un hijo a quien enseña el valor del trabajo duro y el cuidado a la familia.

Actualmente enfrenta problemas en su negocio como la falta de capital.

Esto intentara contrarrestarlo aumentando sus servicios de jardinería, es precisamente ese el motivo por el cual solita un préstamo, pues desea comprar una guadañadora y de esta forma consolidara su negocio para el futuro.
texts.en: At 57 years old, Luis has a lot of energy and drive for his work as a gardener in the municipality of Medellin. He lives in a humble house with his wife and is the father to a child for whom he models the value of hard work and the importance of taking care of one's family. Today he has a problem in that his business doesn't have capital. He would like to increase his gardening services, so he is seeking a loan as he wishes to buy a mowing machine and in this way support his business into the future.

loans.use: to buy a mowing machine and in this way support his business into the future.

loans.name: Pabla Argentina

texts.es:
Pabla tiene 50 años, está a cargo de 5 hijos, Pabla se dedica a la producción de café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser: comercio justo y orgánico, Pabla comercializa su café por medio de COCAFCAL de la cual es socia, los mayores sueños de Pabla es poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y darles una vida digna y que puedan tener una buena educación.
La producción de café bajo sellos de certificación es una novedad en la región ya que permite tener mejores precios por el café además que se contribuye con el bienestar de la rica biodiversidad de la región, pabla quiere certificar su cafetal bajo certificación orgánica y aprovechando que sus cafetales están en muy mal estado quiere replantar para iniciar la certificación con las plantaciones nuevas.
Pabla solicita un crédito para certificar sus cafetales bajo el sello de certificación orgánica lo que le permitirá obtener mejores ganancias por su café, con las ganancias Pabla podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y darles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Pabla is 50 years old and in charge of 5 children. She makes a living in coffee production under different certification labels such as being an organic and fair trader. Pabla sells her coffee through COCAFCAL where she is a member. Her biggest dreams are to be able to support her children and give them a decent life, and that they are able to have a good education. The coffee production under certification labels is a new release in the region and it allows for better prices for the coffee and also contributes to the well-being of the rich biodiversity of the region. 

Pabla wants to certify her coffee plantation under an organic certification. Taking advantage of the fact that her coffee plants are in a very bad state, she wants to replant them to begin the certification with new plants. Pabla is asking for a loan to certify her coffee plants under the organic certification label, which will allow her to get better earnings for her coffee. With the earnings, Pabla will be able to have a better quality of life and give a better education to her children.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers, insecticides and organic pesticides, coffee plants and other needed materials for the conversion to organic production of her coffee.

loans.name: Dativa

texts.en:
Dativa is 35 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 4 and 10 years. One of her children goes to school. 

Dativa owns a shop, which she has been running for the past 15 years, while her husband is a businessman. 

With her loan, Dativa would like to buy more rice, sugar, and soap to resell. The profits from her business will be saved and also used to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar, and soap to resell.

loans.name: Eugenie

texts.en: Eugenie is 37 years old. She is married with four children between 8 months and 13 years old. Three of them go to school. She owns a shop and she has been in this business for the past two years, while her husband is also a businessman. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and soap to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Las Malditas Infieles Group

texts.es:
Trinidad es una mujer de 33 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos de 3, 6 y 9 años, y su negocio es la venta de ropa de segunda mano. 
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, generosa, amable, buena mujer, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘mutualista´ un lugar céntrico caracterizado por el cambódromo, espacio con capacidad para 30mil personas y mil metros de largo, dónde se realiza; el corso de carnavales, desfiles y otras actividades culturales. De clima cálido sub tropical con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Trinidad es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que desarrolla (sentada, la primera de la derecha, viste calza roja). Su vida la disfruta con su esposo que trabaja como constructor y con sus hijos; los 2 mayores estudian en la escuela y el menor aún no se encuentra en edad escolar, viven en un cuarto propio construido de ladrillo y cemento que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. La necesidad por ampliar su negocio la llevó a formar una banca de personas con negocios como; salón de belleza, venta de comida, librería, panadería, venta de pollo, venta de accesorios de teléfono y venta de horneados, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus actividades. Su negocio es la venta de ropa de segunda mano, como; pantalones, poleras, camisetas, camisas, blusas, chompas, chamarras, etc., “el trabajo comienza con la separación de la ropa por edades géneros y temporadas…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que la ropa se vende constantemente, la desventaja es la falta de capital para poder invertir y mejorar sus ventas. Su sueño es abrir un puesto de venta bajo techo, ella desea invertir en su negocio mediante la compra de ropa de segunda mano por mayor. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Trinidad solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa de segunda mano por mayor para abrir un puesto de venta bajo techo.
texts.en:
Trinidad is a 33-year-old married woman, and has three children ages 3, 6 and 9. Her business is selling second-hand clothes. She is a good mother, enterprising, generous, kind, a good woman, responsible and hardworking.

Her business is located in the "mutualista" zone, a central location characterized wide open space with capacity for 30,000 people and is a thousand meters long. Here shows are performed; Corsican carnivals, parades and other cultural activities. Warm subtropical climate is typical with a temperature that varies during the day between 21-35 degrees Celsius.

Trinidad has a dark complexion, brown eyes, black hair pulled into a pony tail; she is short with a robust physique. Her first language is Guaraní which she speaks with family and she speaks Spanish in public and in business. In the photo she is sitting on the right and is wearing red pants. She is enjoying her life with her husband who works as a builder and their children; 2 older children study in school and the youngest is not yet of school age. They live in own house built of brick and cement, and it has water, electricity and sewerage.

The need to expand her business led her to form a banking group with other people. Their businesses are a salon, selling food, bookstore, bakery, selling chicken, selling phone accessories and baked goods, retail; they seek a loan to improve their businesses. Trinidad's business is selling second hand clothes, like pants, sweatshirts, t-shirts, shirts, blouses, sweaters, jackets, etc., "the work begins with the separation of clothes by gender, ages and seasons ..." she says. Her advantage is that her business is constantly selling clothing, the disadvantage is the lack of capital to invest and improve sales. Her dream is to open a stall indoors, she wants to invest in her business by buying second-hand clothes wholesale. This is the 2nd sequence loans in two years with this institution. It is for these reasons that Trinidad apply for a loan for the purchase of second-hand clothes wholesale to open a stall indoors.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing at wholesale in order to open a clothing stand.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase ingrediants to prepare chocolates

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar system to improve the conditions of his home.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en: Chantal is 36 years old. She is married with two children between three and seven years old. They both go to school. She sells foodstuffs and she has been in the business for the past four years, while her husband is also a businessman. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans, bananas and tomatoes to sell. The profits from the business will be saved and used to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more beans, bananas and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Jose Feliciano

texts.es:
Feliciano tiene 5 hijos con su esposa Isabel trabajan a diario para sacar adelante a sus hijos, ellos se dedican a la producción de café bajo distintos sellos de certificación como ser: comercio justo y orgánico. Feliciano e Isabel tienen más de 20 años de producir café y cada día ponen en práctica nuevas técnicas para hacer el cultivo más sostenible. Ellos sueñan con poder darle a sus hijos un buen futuro y Feliciano nos dice: “Me importa formar un patrimonio para dejarles pero también quiero dejarles la belleza y pureza de estas montañas mejor o igual que como yo la eh visto desde que nací” es por eso que Feliciano quiere certificar sus fincas bajo el sello de certificación orgánica.
La producción de café orgánico es una novedad en la región ya que no solo permite tener mejores precios por el café también ayuda a no contaminar las numerosas fuentes de agua de la zona. 
Feliciano solicita un crédito para convertir sus cafetales a producción orgánica y aprovechando que las condiciones de su cafetal no son las mejores la decisión es replantar el cafetal e iniciar la certificación desde 0 con las ganancias obtenidas por su café Feliciano piensa darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y formar un pequeño patrimonio para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Feliciano has 5 children with his wife, Isabel. They work every day to support their children and they make a living in coffee production under different certification labels such as being an organic and fair trader. Feliciano and Isabel have been producing coffee for more than 20 years and they put new techniques into practice every day to make their crop more sustainable. They dream of being able to give their children a good future and Feliciano says, "It is important to me to form a legacy to leave them but I also want to leave them the beauty and purity of these mountains better or equal to how I have seen them since I was born." 

For this reason, Feliciano wants to certify his farms under the organic certification label. Organic coffee production is new in the region and it not only allows better coffee prices but also helps to not contaminate the numerous water sources in the area. Feliciano is asking for a loan to convert his coffee plants to organic production. Taking advantage of the fact that his plants are not in the best condition, his decision is to replant and begin the certification from 0. With the earnings from his coffee, Feliciano hopes to give his family a better quality of life and to form a small legacy for his children.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers, pesticides and organic insecticides, and to over other needed expenses for the conversion of his coffee plantation into organic.

loans.name: Loma Guasu Group

texts.es:
El grupo Loma Guazu está en su ciclo número 22 del programa de comité de mujeres, las integrantes del comité realizan muchos esfuerzos para así poder salir adelante junto con sus familias.
La señora Juana es integrante de este grupo, ayuda al mantenimiento de su casa gracias a la venta de artículos de alfarería, ya sean floreros o adornos para el hogar. El  fin del préstamo que pide es para la obtención de más artículos de alfarería, como ser floreros, jarrones, adornos y otros.
Juana es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para poder salir adelante, y es por ello que participa muy activamente de las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The group “Loma Guasu” is in its 22nd loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. The committee members have put forth a great deal of effort so they can get ahead along with their families.

Sra. Juana is a member of this group. She helps with maintaining her household by selling pottery, which includes floral arrangements and home decorations. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy more pottery supplies, including flowers, urns, ornaments, and other items.

Juana is a hardworking and determined woman who is doing her best to get ahead. For this reason, she is a very active participant in the training seminars.

loans.use: to buy pottery supplies, including flowers, urns, ornaments, and other items.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Inhambane tem 27 anos de idade vive maritalmente é pai de 2 filhas menores de idade e responsabiliza-se pelo seu primo que vive em sua casa.
 Este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku com qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras, varões e mais, para início da sua obra de residência, sendo que o 1º foi para a legalização do terreno. 
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua obra para dar conforto a sua família e iniciar um negócio de venda de material de construção (ferragem ou estaleiro).
texts.en:
Born in Inhambane, he is 27 years old, is married, and has two minor daughters. He is responsible for his cousin who lives in his house.

This is his second loan with Hluvuku and he intends to acquire construction materials like sand, cement, stones, rods, and more to start work on his house. The first was used to legalize the land.

In the future he intends to finish the construction in order to give his family comfort and start a business selling construction materials (hardware or ship building).

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, stones, rods, and more.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is grateful that she was granted a PHP 40,000 loan which she used to buy several dozens of eggs and salted eggs. Through her earnings she was able to support her family and meet their daily basic needs. 

She would now like to apply for another PHP 10,000 loan which she will use to buy dozens of eggs and salted eggs to sell at her store. Eggs are a staple in a Filipino household and are usually eaten at breakfast and are a common ingredient for a number of dishes. She has to meet the regular demand for eggs in her community. She is happy with her increased sales and is thanking God and you in advance for the financial assistance that will be given for her earnings will surely help in their daily sustenance and for children's education.  

Elizabeth dreams of being able to expand her store to serve more customers. She aims to send all her children to College and for prays for God's blessing and guidance for her family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

 All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional eggs and salted eggs.

loans.name: Felecithe

texts.en:
Felecithe is 39 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 12 and 18 years. All of her children go to school. She owns a shop and has been in business for the past 2 years. 

With her loan, Felecithe would like to buy more rice and sugar to resell. The profits from her business will be used to improve her welfare. 

In the future, Felecithe wishes to earn at least 300,000 RWF per month.

loans.use: to buy more rice and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Roger

texts.es: Roger se ha dedicado desde muy joven a la agricultura y ganadería, produciendo Maíz, frijol y tomate. Trabaja muy duro diariamente para darle un mejor futuro a su familia.  Su esposa Rubenia se dedica se dedica las labores del hogar, tienen cinco  niños que asisten a la escuela y por las noches tienen dificultades para elaborar sus trabajos escolares debido a la falta de iluminación, ya que las lámparas no les producen la iluminación necesaria para trabajar mejor y además reciben la contaminación por el uso de querosén. Por esto Roger y su esposa consideran necesario adquirir un sistema solar, ya que este les ayudara a sus niños con las tareas y a ellos con las actividades de la agricultura y el hogar con el menor riesgo de sufrir enfermedades por la contaminación.
texts.en:
Roger has made a living in agriculture and livestock from a young age, producing corn, beans and tomatoes. He works very hard every day to give his family a better future. His wife, Rubenia, makes a living in household chores and they have five children that are in school. At night they have trouble working on their school work because of a lack of light, since the lamps do not produce enough light needed to work better, and furthermore, they get contamination from the use of kerosene. 

For this reason, Roger and his wife think it is necessary to get a solar energy system because this will help their children with their homework. It will also help them with the agricultural jobs and in the home to have less risk of suffering illnesses from the contamination.

loans.use: to buy a solar energy system to improve his living conditions.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.en:
Rodolfo works as a driver. He lives alone in a very tiny room. All the money he makes is not enough, so Rodolfo will start selling eggs and oil. His plan is to go to many grocery stores to offer the eggs and the oil.

Rodolfo is healthy, and he works hard. He is good with numbers. He hopes you can help him because he doesn’t have anyone who can give him some money.

loans.use: to start selling eggs and oil.

loans.name: Rocio Del Pilar

texts.es:
ROCIO TIENE 32 AÑOS,VIVE EN CASA PROPIA CON SU CONYUGE E HIJOS, LOS CUALES ESTUDIAN EN COLEGIO NACIONAL DEL DISTRITO DE CAYALTI, PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGION LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERÚ. UNA COMUNIDAD DEDICADA A LA AGRICULTURA, COMERCIO Y GANADERÍA.

ROCIO DEL PILAR SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ROPA PARA DAMAS, CABALLEROS Y NIÑOS HACE MÁS DE 10 AÑOS, CON BUENAS REFERENCIAS POR PARTE DE SUS CLIENTES, EL DESTINO DEL CRÉDITO SERÁ LA INVERSIÓN EN LA COMPRA DE MERCADERÍA PARA AMPLIAR EL STOCK DE SU NEGOCIO, DE ESTA MANERA CUBRIR LAS NECESIDADES Y GUSTOS DE SUS CLIENTES, GENERANDO MAYORES INGRESO QUE LE AYUDARÁN A MEJORAR SU CALIDA DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Rocio is 32, she lives in her own house with her spouse and children, who study in the national school of the Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, northern coast of Peru. It's a community dedicated to agriculture, trade and animal husbandry.

Rocio del Pilar has worked selling clothing for women, men and children for the past 10 years, with good references on behalf of her customers. The purpose of the loan will be the investment in the purchase of merchandise to grow the stock of her business and, in this manner, to cover the necessities and tastes of her customers, generating more income that will help her improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to grow the stock of her business.

loans.name: Dúo Jerusalén De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
Dúo Jerusalén de San Bartolo
Este dúo está formado por doña Elvia, ella tiene 46 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama, caballeros y niños,tambien vende comida en su local ubicado en su domicilio desde ya hace muchos años, ella esta solicitando el crédito para la compra de ropa, de dama caballero y niños, su propósito es surtir su tienda de ropa, y tambien para la compra de productos comestibles para la elaboracion de refacciones(comidas).
texts.en:
Jerusalén de San Bartolo Partnership

This partnership is formed by Elvia; she is 46 years old and works selling clothing for women, men and children. She has also sold food in her place of business, located in her home for many years already. She is applying for the loan for the purchase of clothing for men, women and children. Her goal is to stock her clothing store, and also to buy edible products for making snacks (foods).

loans.use: to buy clothing and edible products for making snacks.

loans.name: Alba

texts.es:
Alba es una bella mujer de 51 años de edad, madre de 4 hijos, criada con unas muy buenas costumbres, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión y gusto por todo lo relacionado con la belleza.  

Inicio su etapa productiva realizando cursos y capacitaciones, hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio de salón de belleza en su hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de unas vitrinas para exhibir productos como cremas capilares, ceras, entre otros en su negocio.

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con estos elementos.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese de la mano de Interactuar y tenga muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Alba is a beautiful woman, 51 years old, mother of 4 children. Raised with very good habits, since school she developed a great passion and liking for everything related to beauty.

She started her productive phase doing courses and training, until the day she ventured out and decided to go in search of her own clientele, setting up a beauty salon business in her home.

She is applying for a loan for the purchase of some glass cabinets to display products like hair creams, waxes, among others in her business.

The loan will be very important for her, well, she will finish consolidating her business, completing it with these elements.

Her dream is that her business will progress at the hand of Interactuar and that she will have many customers.

loans.use: to buy some glass cabinets to show products like hair creams, waxes, among others in her business.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael de 68 años, aprendió el arte de la zapatería cuando trabajaba como ayudante en un taller de calzado,  al adquirir todo el conocimiento necesario para ejercer esta profesión no dudó en independizarse e iniciar su propio negocio en el año 1965.  Todos los días este emprendedor hombre desde su local ofrece exclusivos diseños de calzado para dama en diferentes tonalidades y texturas, garantizando la durabilidad, comodidad y llenando las expectativas de sus clientes.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en materiales para la producción; suelas, cuero, material sintetico, goma, herrajes y accesorios.  Rafael es padre de dos hijos mayores de edad a quienes sostuvo gracias al fruto de su trabajo.  Su meta a futuro es contratar un operario para incrementar su producción y remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rafael, 68, learned the art of shoe making when he worked as a helper in a shoe workshop. Upon acquiring all of the knowledge necessary to carry out this profession, he didn't doubt in making himself independent and starting his own business in the year 1965. Every day this entrepreneur man, from his business, offers exclusive shoe designs for women in different tones and textures, guaranteeing durability, comfort and filling the expectations of his customers.

Currently, he is applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which he will invest in materials for production: soles, leather, synthetic material, rubber, nails and accessories.

Rafael is the father of two children, of age, whom he's sustained thanks to the fruit of his work. His goal in the future is to hire an operator to increase his production and remodel his home.

loans.use: to invest in materials for production: soles, leather, synthetic material, rubber, nails and accessories.

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es:
Juliana es una mujer de 53 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo de 20 años, y su negocio es el tejido de mantas de Alpaca y Vicuña.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, fuerte, luchadora, dedicada, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘16 de julio’ área central situada al este de la ciudad, reúne a gran parte de los edificios administrativos, comerciales y sedes de organizaciones sociales. De clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Juliana es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello gris largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que desarrolla. Su vida la realiza con su esposo que trabaja como chófer y con su hijo que estudia y trabaja, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es el tejido de mantas de Alpaca y Vicuña; que son fibras muy populares y finas, su suavidad y valores térmicos la hacen única, “Utilizo un telar manual, que forma parte de nuestra identidad, ya que con él tejo ropa, usando diferentes tipos de lana…” comenta. la ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes continuos, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de lana, ya que esta se debe traer desde el altiplano. Su sueño es capacitar a personas en el uso del telar y tejido de mantas, ella desea realizar la compra de lana por mayor. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 20 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Juliana solicita el préstamo para la compra de lana de alpaca y vicuña para capacitar a personas en el uso del telar.
texts.en:
Juliana is a 53 year old woman. She lives with her partner and has one 20 year old son. Her business is weaving alpaca and llama blankets. She is a good mother, enterpriser, strong, fighter, dedicated, responsible and a hard-worker. Her business is in the "16 de julio" area, located to the east of the city. This area holds a large part of the administrative and commercial buildings, and headquarters of social organizations. The city has a cold and dry climate with a temperature that varies throughout the day between 0-12 degrees Celsius. 

Juliana is dark-skinned, with brown eyes, long grey hair that she ties back, short stature, and medium physique. Her dress style is traditional (hat, shawl and skirt). Her native language is Aymará which she speaks with family, and she speaks Spanish in general use and for her business. She lives with her husband, who works as a chauffeur, and with her son who works and goes to school. They live in their own home made of bricks and cement with a tin roof, and they have running water, electricity and sewerage. 

Her business in weaving alpaca and llama blankets. They are very popular and fine fibers, and their softness and thermal values make them unique. "I use a hand loom which forms part of our identity, and with it I weave clothing, using different types of wool..." she says. The advantage of her business is that she has continuous clients. The disadvantage is lack of money to buy wool, since it must be brought from the highlands. 

Her dream is to train people to use the loom and to weave blankets. She wishes to buy wool wholesale. This is the 1st loan sequence with the institution in the 20 years that she has done this job. For these reasons, Juliana is asking for a loan to buy alpaca and llama wool to train people to use the loom.

loans.use: to buy alpaca and llama wool to train people to use the loom.

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Тожинисо живет и работает на районе Кубадиен. Ей 52 года. У нее большая семья, состоящая из мужа, двоих детей, невестки и двоих внуков. Муж Тожинисо преподаватель. Дети студенты. Тожинисо уже много лет работает в государственных органах. На данный момент Тожинисо не может выйти на работу, так как имеет проблемы со своим здоровьем в области сердца. Она обратилась за кредитом, чтобы оплатить свое лечение в больнице и купить препараты. Она верит, что ей помогут, и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Tojiniso lives and works in the region of Qubadiyon. She is 52 years old. She has a big family: her husband, two kids, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Tojiniso’s husband is a teacher. Their kids are university students. Tojiniso has been a public servant for many years. 
Currently Tojiniso is on a sick leave because of the health problems with her heart. She requested a loan to pay for her medical treatment and buy prescription drugs. She believes in your help and is grateful in advance.

loans.use: to pay hospital medical expenses and buy prescription drugs

loans.name: Ángela Esther

texts.es: Ángela tiene 57 años, apoyada en sus conocimientos decidió en 1995, ofrecer sus servicios como masajista corporal (masajes relajantes y post operatorios), aprovecho sus relaciones con los clientes y comenzó a ofrecerles mercancías a crédito por encargos; jeans, camisetas y prendas de vestir en general.  Aunque reconoce que al comienzo fue difícil, su desafío fue poco a poco conseguir los recursos para que con estas dos actividades obtuviese excelentes resultados económicos y lograr combinar perfectamente su papel de empresaria con el de madre de cinco hijos. Ángela manifiesta que su incursión en la vida empresarial se originó ante la necesidad personal y económica, con la convicción de que con esfuerzo podía aportar mucho a su realidad, además del deseo de brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en Jeans y camisetas,  inversión con la que busca incrementar sus ventas, obtener mejores ganancias y seguir haciendo crecer su negocio para mantenerse en actividad constante.
texts.en:
Ángela is 57 years old, supported by the experience she has gained through her work as a masseuse since 1995. She provides massages to relax as well as post-operative. She enjoys her relationships with her clients and began to sell them merchandise on credit such as jeans, t-shirts, and other items of clothing. Even though it was difficult at the beginning, little by little she was able to get the resources she needed for both her massage and selling clothing businesses and had excellent results. She was able to balance her role as businesswoman and mother to five children.
Angela maintains that her entrance into business was born out of personal and economic necessity. With great conviction and effort she was able to meet her needs, in addition to provide a better quality of life for her children.

Today she seeks a loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy jeans and t-shirts. She hopes this investment will increase her sales, and she will have better income and continue growing her business in order to continue supporting herself and keep busy.

loans.use: to buy jeans and t-shirts.

loans.name: Viriginie

texts.en:
Viriginie is 47 years old. She is married with four children aged between 8 and 18 years; they all go to school.

She owns a foodstuffs business, and she has been in business for two years, while her husband is a farmer. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, and salt to sell.

The profits from the business will be used to build a house. In the future, she aims to earn at least 100,000 RWF per month

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar, and salt to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Daner

texts.es:
Gloria es una madre cabeza de familia de 44 años de edad, una persona humilde, trabajadora, que con tenacidad y compromiso levanto a su familia conformada por 3 hijos dos adolescentes  y el menor de tan solo 7 años de edad, todos ellos hombres. 

Gloria trabaja en un local arrendado es una tienda de videojuegos, vende consolas, películas, controles, accesorios, mouse, controles para computador entre otros, negocio que le ha brindado la posibilidad no solo de mantener su familia sino de mejorar la calidad de vida considerablemente, de pasar a vivir casi con lo elemental a poder brindar estudio, buena alimentación, un techo y vestimenta es un gran progreso para un madre que se la ha luchado sola. 

Gloria quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de consolas Xbox, play y  accesorios de computador, ya que necesita mejorar sus ventas para pagar el arrendamiento tan costoso que le han impuesto.

El deseo de Gloria es tener un local propio y vivir cómodamente.
texts.en:
Gloria is a 44-year-old mother and head of household. She is a humble, hardworking person. With tenacity and commitment, she raised her family, made up of 3 children--two adolescents and the youngest is only 7 years old. They are all boys. 

Gloria works in rented shop, selling video games, consoles, movies, controllers, accessories, mouses, and computer controllers, among other items. This business has provided her the possibility to not only support her family, but also to considerably improve their quality of life. Going from living with the very basics to being able to provide studies, good food, shelter and clothing is great progress for a mother who has struggled to do it alone. 

Gloria wants to request a loan to purchase X-box and Playstation consoles and computer accessories, since she needs to improve her sales to pay the very costly rent they are charging her. Gloria's desire is to have a premises of her own and live comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase Playstation and X-Box consoles.

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали молодой 26 летный трудолюбивый парень. Он из района Чиликул. Шерали  проживает вместе с отцом, матерью, сестренкой и женой. Его семья дехканин, все они занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Все жители района и села Республики занимаются сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Шерали с утра начинает заниматься до вечера. Он занимается земледелием. Ему нравится своя работа. Шерали 6 лет продвигает работу на земле. Он вперед сева урожай обработал землю минеральными  удобрениями для, сейчас настало время обработать урожай минеральными удобрениями, но у Шерали не осталось минеральных удобрений. Для купли необходимые средства у него нет денег.  И он обратился за кредитом.
texts.en:
Sherali is a 26-year-old young hard-working guy. She lives in the region of Jilikul. Sherali lives with his father, mother, sister and wife. They are all dekhan farmers involved in agricultural activities. All residents of Jilikul are involved in agriculture. 

Sherali works from dawn till dusk. She is a farmer. He enjoys his work very much and he has been doing it for six years. Before sowing, Sherali had applied mineral fertilizers to the land, and now it is time to apply them to the harvest, but Sherali has run out of his fertilizers supply. And he doesn’t have enough money to purchase more. That’s why he requested a loan.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Bendecidas Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario bendecidas está conformado por tres mujeres laboriosas, coordinado por Silvia de 38 años de edad, casada y madre de tres hijos, quienes son su mayor motivación, ella se dedica a la venta de atol y elotes cocidos desde hace veinte años, es el séptimo ciclo que solicitan financiamiento en Adim, con los créditos anteriores logro mejorar el techo de su vivienda y comprar un carretón para salir a vender en su comunidad, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de arroz, leche, azúcar, canela, leña y elotes. La segunda socia es María de 44 años quien se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada, la tercer socia es Celeste de 21 años de edad, ella es costurera.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Bendecidas (Blessed) is made up of three hardworking women, coordinated by Silvia. 

Silvia is 38 years old, married and mother of three children, who are greatest motivation. She has made a living selling a warm cornflower drink and boiled sweet corn for the past 20 years.

This is the seventh loan cycle she has requested from Adim. With previous loans she managed to improve the roof of her house and buy a small cart to go out and sell in her community. She asks for this loan to purchase of rice, milk, sugar, cinnamon, wood and sweet corn.

The second member is María, 44 years old, who makes a living selling new and used clothes. The third member is Celeste, 21 years old, who is a seamstress.

loans.use: to purchase rice, milk, sugar, cinnamon, wood and sweet corn.

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es: María una emprendedora mujer de 62 años que se siente orgullosa de sus 30 años de experiencia como microempresaria independiente, lo que más le agrada de su trabajo es el contacto con la gente, escucharla y estar siempre al pendiente del más mínimo detalle que le genere una oportunidad de negocio. Su idea de negocio se originó por la necesidad de generar ingresos para aportar a la familia de tal manera que con sus ahorros organizó su venta de variedades desde su hogar en donde atiende a transeúntes y vecinos del sector ofreciéndole papelería, cosméticos, útiles escolares, perfumes y detalles de ocasión. María está solicitando su primer credikiva, a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para incrementar su surtido en  papelería, cosméticos, útiles escolares, perfumes y detalles de ocasión,  inversión con la que espera un incremento significativo de sus ventas y que le ayudará no solo a contribuir mejor a la economía de su casa, sino que también obtendrá realización personal y será un apoyo y soporte para su familia.
texts.en:
María is a 62 year old entrepreneur who is proud of her 30 years of experience as an independent business owner.  What she enjoys most about her work is that she is able to meet people, listen to people and is always keeping an eye out for any business opportunities.  The idea for her business came from her need to earn an income to support her family. She used her savings to set up her store in her home where she attends to passersby and neighbors, offering them stationary, cosmetics, school supplies, perfumes and other items.  

María is seeking her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo in order to increase her inventory of stationary, cosmetics, school supplies, perfumes and other items. She hopes that this investment will allow her to significantly increase her sales, which will help her to not only contribute more to her household's finances, but to also reach personal fulfillment and support her family.

loans.use: increase her inventory of stationary, cosmetics, school supplies, perfumes and other items.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.en: Roxana is 25 years old and she works at a fast food restaurant from 18:00 to 24:00. Roxana is also going to college and she needs a loan to pay the tuition. She is studying accounting. Roxana is almost finished with her studies.  She hopes you can help her.  Roxana is single and she doesn't have children, but she lives with her parents and she helps them pay the rent.

loans.use: to pay her tuition for accounting.

loans.name: Nohemy Del Socorro

texts.es:
A sus 55 años, Nohemy tiene mucha energía y empuje para trabajar en su negocio de alquiler de lavadoras en el municipio de Medellin.
Vive en una humilde casa con su compañero sentimental y con sus 2 hijas a quienes enseña el valor del trabajo duro y el valor del cuidado a la familia.

Actualmente enfrenta problemas en su negocio como la competencia en el sector.

Esto intenta contrarrestarlo comprando mas lavadoras y es precisamente ese el motivo por el cual solita un préstamo, pues desea comprar estos aparatos y de esta forma consolidara su negocio para el futuro!
texts.en:
At 55 years old, Noheme has a lot of energy and drive to work in her business of renting washing machines in the city of Medellin.  

She lives in a simple house with her partner and her two daughters, to whom she teaches the value of hard work and the importance of family.  

Presently she is having problems in her business such as the competition in her field.  She is trying to counteract it by purchasing more washing machines, which is why she is asking for a loan.  She wants to buy the machines and solidify her business for the future.

loans.use: to purchase washing machines to have a better service.

loans.name: Evelia

texts.es: Doña Evelin de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, ella se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de ganado bovino tiene 30 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, comercializa sus productos con los comerciantes que están cerca de la zona donde ella reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Evelin is 62 years old and lives with her husband and daughter in a house that they own.  She works farming and raising cattle, which she has been doing for 30 years.  She sells her produce along with other merchants near the area where she lives.  With her earnings, she is able to afford some of her household expenses.  

Evelin is seeking this loan to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizers, herbicides, etc., as well as to improve her land, which can be seen in the photograph.  This way she will be able to increase her earnings so that she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc., as well as improve the land.

loans.name: Sadoqat

texts.ru: Садокат молодая женщина из района Спитамен. Ей 35 лет. Она жена и мать двоих детей. Садокат много лет занимается растениеводством. Так как это сезонная работа и у нее остается много времени, она хочет дома открыть новый бизнес. Она будет заниматься животноводческой деятельностью. У нее есть не большой, но опыт в этой сфере и Садокат уверена, что справится с работой на скотном дворе. За счет заемных средств она приобретет скотов и корма для них, а коровник она уже построила. Садокат уверена в своем успехе и в Ваше поддержке.
texts.en:
Sadoqat is a young woman living in the region of Spitamen. She is 35 years old. She is married, a mother of two. Sadoqat has been cultivating plants for a living for many years. 

Since this work is seasonal, she has a lot of time to start a new business from home. She will be breeding livestock. She has some experience in this field, and she is confident that she will manage the work on the stockyard successfully. Using the borrowed money, she will purchase livestock and fodder for them, and as for the cow house, Sadoqat has already built it. She is confident in her success and in your support of her.

loans.use: to buy livestock and fodder to start a new livestock-breeding business

loans.name: Dúo Esmeralda De Santiago Group

texts.es:
Dúo Esmeralda de Santiago
Representado por doña Vera, madre soltera de dos niños quienes ya estudian, ella se dedica a la venta de regalos para toda ocasión, también a la elaboración de piñatas, venta de dulces para las mismas y todo lo que necesite una piñata, desde hace cuatro años realiza esta actividad, su sueño es ver a sus hijos estudiando y darle lo que ella no ha tenido, ahora desea ampliarlo con venta de útiles escolares y espera le funcione pues su local está en el mercado Municipal de Santiago.
texts.en: The Esmeralda de Santiago Duo is represented by Vera, a single mother of two children who are in school. She sells gifts for all occasions. She also makes piñatas and sells candies for them and everything that a piñata needs. For four years, she has been doing this activity. Her dream is to see her children in school and give them what she hasn't had. Now she wants to expand by selling school supplies and she hopes this works for her. Her locale is in the municipal market of Santiago.

loans.use: to buy products to make piñatas and school supplies to sell.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.en:
Juan Carlos is a 33-year-old husband and father of two young boys. He lives in the rural municipality of Uramita, located in the west of Antioquia. Having initially learned from his mother, Juan Carlos went on to set up his own pig farm in 2007. He earns his living by working hard and attending to his animals seven days a week.

Working in the pig farming sector poses certain challenges, however. Juan Carlos needs the help of a loan so that he can compete with other farms and manage the high expenses that come with working in this field. He wants to create a culture of sustainability for future years. Specifically, he is looking to increase the number of pigs he owns.

He envisions a future in which he owns a more expansive and successful farm, while simultaneously improving the living conditions for his family. Your loan will help Juan Carlos and his family achieve this dream!

loans.use: to increase the number of pigs he owns

loans.name: Erkinjon

texts.ru: Эркинжон смелый и спокойный муж и отец. У него одна дочка. Эркинжону 38 лет. Он житель района Чиликул.  Эркинжон занимается животноводством. Он выращивает крупнорогатого скота у себя во дворе. У него нет сына, чтобы помог ему в работе. Но Эркинчон отлично справляется со своей работой. У него имеется коровник и скота. Он покупает скота и откармливает их несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. Ему надо приобрести корм для корма скота. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Эркинжон обратился за кредитом. Он очень нуждается в кредит. В будущем Эрктнжон планирует расширить животноводческую деятельность.
texts.en:
Erkinjon is a brave and calm husband and father. He has a daughter. He is 38 years old living in the region of Jilikul. Erkinjon is breeding livestock for a living. He breeds cattle in his yard. He doesn’t have a son who could help him in this business, but Erkinjon is very capable and manages well alone. 
 
Erkinjon has a cow house and cattle. He purchases cattle for fattening, then after several months resells it on the cattle market. Now Erkinjon needs to buy fodder to feed the animals. Because of shortage of funds, he requested a loan. Erkinjon is planning to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fodder for livestock

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego tiene 65 años de edad, conviviente, sin hijos a su cargo , vive en casa propia; domiciliado en el caserío Corral Viejo que pertenece al distrito Bolivar, provincia San Miguel de la Región Cajamarca, Sierra norte de Perú la cual es una zona rural.

Diego se dedica a brindar servicio de jornalería; hace 35 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; compra de herramientas para trabajo como son palanas, picos,entre otros, esto con la finalidad de brindar mejores servicio a sus clientes, generar mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Diego is 65 years old, married and does not have children.  He lives in a house that he owns in Corral Viejo, which is in the Bolivar district, San Miguel Province, in the Catamarca region of Peru's northern sierra. It is a rural zone.  

Diego works as a day laborer. He has worked as a day laborer for 35 years and he works out of his home.  He is seeking a loan to purchase work tools such as shovels and pickaxes with the goal of offering better service to his clients, increase his earnings and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: purchase tools such as shovels and pickaxes.

loans.name: Dúo Cipresal De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
Dúo Cipresal de San Bartolo
Este dúo está formado por doña Rosario del Carmen, ella tiene 39 años de edad y se dedica al cultivo y venta de flores en el área de San Bartolomé Milpas Altas, en su vivero ubicado en su domicilio, desde ya hace muchos años, ella esta solicitando el crédito para la compra de platillas, broza, arena blanca, su propósito es surtir mas su vivero aprovechando la temporada de lluvia, espera que la puedan ayudar para seguir adelante con su negocio.
texts.en:
Cipresal de San Bartolo Duo

This duo was formed by Rosario del Carmen. She is 39 years old. She grows and sells flowers in the area of San Bartolomé Milpas Altas. She does it in her greenhouse, located at her home. She has done it for several years. She is asking for the loan to buy saucers, brush, and white sand. Her goal is to stock her greenhouse more to take advantage of the rainy season. She hopes you can help her continue with her business.

loans.use: to grow flowers.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
A sus 61 años el señor Manuel, trabaja reparando electrodomésticos desde su casa, un medio por el cual él ha podido sostenerse y salir adelante.
El desea abrir su primer local el cual le permita aumentar sus clientes, y generar más ingresos.

Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, y dejarles el negocio a sus hijos para que dependan de este.

Manuel solicitud un préstamo con el cual arrendara un nuevo local y comprara material de trabajo.

Con su apoyo este hombre podrá seguir su sueño.
texts.en:
At 61 years old, Manuel works repairing appliances from his house, a means by which he's been able to sustain himself and get ahead. He wishes to open his first storefront, which will allow him to increase his customers and generate more income.

His dream is to improve the conditions of his home, and leave the business to his children so that they can depend upon it.

Manuel is applying for a loan with which he will rent a new storefront and will buy working materials.

With your support, this man will be able to follow his dream.

loans.use: to rent a new place of business and to buy working materials.

loans.name: Maria Patricia

texts.en:
Maria is a 31-year-old mother of two daughters, aged 5 and 8. She lives in the rural municipality of Don Matias in northern Antioquia. She makes a living selling agricultural products and specializes in dairy cattle. She is assisted by her husband, who is also responsible for helping set up the business in 2014.

Diary farming is an expensive enterprise, and for this reason she is asking for a loan of 5,000,000 COP so that she may buy two more dairy cows and provide them with a better pasture. This will help make her business more efficient and sustainable, as well as increase her income.

Maria is a devoted mother and wife, and dreams of improving her family’s lifestyle by buying a home and paying for the education of her two girls.

loans.use: to buy two more dairy cows and provide them with a better pasture.

loans.name: Kholdor

texts.ru: Холдор 65 летний мужчина. Он уроженец из солнечного района Шахритус. Холдор занимается растениеводством на протяжении 25 лет. Он знает каждую мелочь и все тонкости этой деятельности. Холдор посадил новый урожай и теперь нужно обработать минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить хороший и качественный сбор. Холдор на заемные средства приобретет минеральные удобрения. Холдор верит в Вашу поддержку и ждет свой урожай.
texts.en: Kholdor is 65 years old. He is a native resident of the sunny region of Shahrituz. Kholdor has been cultivating plants for 25 years. He knows every small detail and peculiarity of this business. Kholdor has planted new crops, and now it is time to apply fertilizers to the land in order to reap a good quality harvest later. Kholdor will use the borrowed money to purchase mineral fertilizers. He hopes for your support and expects a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Akram

texts.ru: Мужчину на фотографии зовут Акрам. Ему 55 лет. Акрам с семьей проживает в маленьком северном районе Спитамен. Акрам 20 своей жизни посвятил земледелию. Он каждый год сажает урожай, и каждый раз волнуется перед сбором, в надежде на хороший урожайность. Акрам давно хотел заниматься иным делом. Он любит животных и ему нравиться проводить время с ними. Акрам решил совместить приятное с полезным. Он будет выращивать скотин. К началу бизнеса он подготовился отлично. Построил коровник и запася кормом. Он просит его поддержать, чтобы купить несколько телят, тогда он сможет начать бизнес и осуществить свою мечту.
texts.en:
The man in the picture is Akram. He is 55 years old. He and his family live in the northern region of Spitamen. Akram has devoted 20 years of his life to farming. Every year he plants crops, and every year he is worried for the harvest hoping it will be good and plentiful. 

For a long time, Akram has had a desire to do something else for a living. He loves animals and spending time with them. Akram decided to combine business with pleasure, and to start breeding livestock. He is very well-prepared for his new undertaking having built a cow house and purchased fodder supply. He is asking for your support to buy several calves, so that he can launch the new business and realize his dream!

loans.use: to start a livestock-breeding business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets, feed, and food for family consumption.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.en:
43-year-old Luz is mother to her 10 year daughter and lives in the Cundinamarcan village of Caparrapi. She began her chicken farming business in 2013 as a way of making a living, and helped further her knowledge of the business by taking classes aimed at female entrepreneurs such as herself.

She works diligently every day of the week but needs a loan so she can become more competitive in the poultry sector. She aims to do so by purchasing more chickens for her inventory and expanding her ranch.

The effect this can have on her business is huge, helping it become more sustainable and increasing her income, so that one day she can buy her dream house.

loans.use: purchase more chickens and expand her ranch.

loans.name: Magda Lorena

texts.en:
Magda is a 26 year old who lives in the rural town of Caparrapi, in the region of Cundinamarca, with her 5 year old daughter. She earns her living selling pigs, and works tirelessly for 8 hours a day, every day of the week.

She is looking for a loan of $3,500,000 COP so that she can purchase 2 more pigs and more material for her pigsty, as currently there is not adequate space for the piglets.

She aspires to run a farm that can be sustainable for the long term and that competes in the market. She also dreams of being able to pay for the education of her young daughter and would love to improve their living conditions. Your help can make this possible!

loans.use: purchase 2 more pigs and more material for her pigsty

loans.name: Casa De Jesus Group

texts.en:
The small town of Cantel in the Guatemalan state of Quetzaltenango is the home of the Friendship Bridge “Casa de Jesús” which was formed last year by nine entrepreneurial women. These ladies were motivated to join Friendship Bridge in order to access the “Microcredit Plus” program that combines small loans and non-formal educational trainings. 

Antonia is beginning her second loan cycle.  Since she began with “Casa de Jesús” last year, she has seen the positive results of an injection of income into her local business of selling snacks, chicken and fries along with tortillas.  Antonia is requesting a new loan in order to buy an industrial stove, soft drinks, juices, corn for tortillas, chicken and potatoes so that she can continue to expand and grow her businesses.

Antonia and the ladies in the group are very aware of the value of education. It is a priority for them to enroll their children in school. As all of them have had little or no education, they look forward to their monthly meetings with a Friendship Bridge Facilitator shares useful information with them on a variety of subjects. They learn how to take care of themselves and their families with new knowledge about hygiene, nutrition, and the use of medicinal plants. They gain valuable business tools as they learn about business planning and management, budgeting, pricing, marketing, accounting and customer service. They empower themselves as they participate in games and role playing and learn to identify goals and dreams. 

On behalf of all the members of “Casa de Jesús”, Antonia thanks the Kiva investors for their support and the investment they make in the women of Guatemala that makes it possible for all of them to have better opportunities and futures.  Thank you KIVA investors!!!

loans.use: To buy an industrial stove, soft drinks, juices, corn for tortillas, chicken and potatoes so that she can continue to expand her snack business

loans.name: Teodolinda

texts.es: Teodolinda tiene 40 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposo con quien lleva varios años de casado y un hijo que actualmente se encuentra estudiando. Teodolinda es una mujer trabajadora que se esfuerza mucho por su familia y desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la prestación de servicios varios y a la venta de productos por catalogo, anteriormente obtuvo un crédito que utilizo para repellar las paredes y encementar  el piso de adentro de la casa y debido a la buena experiencia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI dado que desea seguir mejorando las condiciones de su vivienda  con el propósito de dar a su familia una vivienda mas digna,  con el crédito otorgado comprará cemento y arena  para repellar las paredes y encementar el piso del corredor.
texts.en:
Teodolinda is 40 years old.  She lives in her own home with her husband, with whom she has spent several years of marriage, and a child who is now in school.  Teodolinda is a hard-working woman who puts a lot of effort into supporting her family.  She has worked a long time providing various domestic services and selling products from catalogs.

She previously had a loan that she used to plaster the walls and cement the floor inside her house.  Due to the good experience of doing that, she has made the decision to ask for a new loan from FUSAI since she wishes to continue improving the condition of her house, with the purpose of giving her family a more decent home.  With the loan she will buy cement and sand in order to plaster the walls and cement the floor of the “corredor” [roofed open-sided veranda that runs the length of the side of the house].

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls and cement the floor of the"corredor" [roofed open-sided veranda that runs the length of the side of the house]

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is a 56-year-old woman from the town of Moalboal, Cebu. She is married with three children. Her youngest is fifteen and the other two are adults.

Estrella has been engaged in hog-raising for twelve years now. Estrella is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy piglets and feed, and pay for the tuition of her child. Once her needs for these are taken care of, Estrella will be able to concentrate on her efforts on managing her business well for a better return on her investments.

Estrella plans to expand her business someday.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed and pay for her child's tuition.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 21 years old from Alegria, Cebu in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. Her eldest is 4 years old, and her youngest is 1 year old. 

Mary Jane has been in the business of raising hogs for 3 years now. This helps augment the income of her husband who works as a factory worker. 

Mary Jane is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy feed. She is determined to increase her business profits by taking care of her hogs well. 

In the future, Mary Jane hopes to have other business opportunities and a bigger piggery to earn a better income. Her income will be used for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita has started her small time business of seafood vending. She has managed to have enough inventory and rolls up her capital to gain more profit. Everyday she made good sales in their barangay.

Recently she approached Paglaum for much needed capital to buy seafood to sell. In the future, she hopes to create a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to buy seafood to sell.

loans.name: Jujie

texts.en:
Jujie is 33 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children who are now at their school age. 

For 10 years already, Jujie and her husband earned their means of living from the service income of their single sitter motorcab for hire business. Jujie earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month from this business activity. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing spare parts and accessories particularly tires, tubes, chains, sprockets and paints for the repair and maintenance of their motorcycle. Jujie has been a member of PMPC for 8 years. In the future, Jujie hopes to acquire an additional motorcycle for hire.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing spare parts and accessories for her motorcab

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is 39 years old and lives in Seti, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Leonida is separated and has three children now at their school age. Leonida is engaged in coconut and copra trading business for almost 13 years already. She earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this business activity. 
She is requesting a loan amount of PHP 14,500 to be used in purchasing additional coconuts for copra processing and re-trading. Leonida has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Leonida hopes to expand her coconut and copra trading business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing additional coconuts for copra processing and re-trading

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is 47 years old and lives in Seti, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with one child now at its school age. Teodora earns a living from coconut and copra (dried coconut meat) buying and trading business. She's been in the business for 13 years already. She earns approximately PHP 7,000 each month doing this type of business activity. She is also receiving a monthly pension as a surviving spouse. 

Teodora has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional coconuts and copra for processing and resale. Teodora has been a member of PMPC for almost 2 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her coconut and copra trading business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing additional coconuts and copra for processing and resale

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 53 years old and lives in Magsaysay, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children now at their adult and school age. Alma has been engaged in a hog raising activity for 30 years and earns approximately 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing 3 piglets and sack of feed for her hog raising activity. Alma has been a member of PMPC for  one year. In the future, Alma hopes to expand her hog raising business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing 3 piglets and a sack of feed

loans.name: Gwendolyn

texts.en:
Gwendolyn is 52 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is single with no dependents. 
Gwendolyn at present is a guardian of her relative’s children. She is receiving a monthly allotment of not less than Php6 ,000.00 each month to sustain her needs.  

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing a brand new washing machine to ease her household laundry activity. 
Gwendolyn has been a member of PMPC for almost 5 years. In the future, Gwendolyn hopes to engage in retailing business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing a brand new washing machine, to ease her laundry needs

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.en:
Leidy is 22 years old and sells clothing and accessories from her home in La Dorada, Caldas. She works tirelessly every day of the week for 8 hours, in order to provide herself and her son with a better quality of life. 

She wants to use a loan so that she can buy more stock in both clothing and accessories. Above all she wants to provide sufficient supply for her women customers, and purchase more steel jewellery. 

She hopes that with the help of this loan she can improve her living conditions and create a better future for her child whilst achieving long term success with her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock in both clothing and accessories

loans.name: Jose Neftali

texts.es: Jose de 36 años de edad se dedica desde hace 15 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, es padre soltera vive con su hija en casa propia, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Jose is 36 years old and has been growing corn and beans for 15 years.  He sells his produce in the various markets near his house.  He is a single dad and lives with his daughter in their own house.

Jose is asking for a loan so he can buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticide, etc. to improve the land shown in the photograph. This will allow him to continue with his work and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticide, etc. to improve the land.

loans.name: Wendelyn

texts.en:
Wendelyn is 36 years old from Alcantara, Cebu. She is married with three young children.

Ten years ago, Wendelyn started raising hogs. Her business is thriving but since she is also supporting three dependents she needs additional capital to keep it going. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy piglets and feed, and pay for the tuition fees of her kids.

Wendelyn hopes that in the future, her business will continue to flourish and give her family a comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed, and pay the tuition fees for her kids.

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda has always been enthusiastic about farming. She has cultivated their rice land in Upper Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental and has yielded good earnings doing this type of work.

Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Luzminda knew that she had to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season.

In the future, Luzminda hopes to buy a hauling truck for easy transport of produce.

loans.use: to pay for land and seedbed preparations

location.town: Plaridel-Upper Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occide

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 66 years old and lives in Baga, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 5 children now at their adult age. 
Erlinda even if she’s a disabled person, she still loves to raise pigs and she’s in this activity for 5 years already. She is also earning support from her husband who is a farmer and financial support from her sons.  She earns approximately PHP2,500.00 each month . 

She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing 1 piglet and sacks of feeds for her hog fattening activity. 
Erlinda has been a member of PMPC for almost 13 years. In the future, Erlinda hopes to expand her hog fattening business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing 1 piglet and sacks of feeds

loans.name: Luis Edison

texts.en:
32 year old Luis lives with his partner in the municipality of La Dorada, located in the region of Caldas, where he earns a living running a pig farm. He has been in charge of the business since 2013 and is an extremely hard worker who never takes a day off.

With this loan he wants to create greater sustainability by buying more pigs and more produce to fatten them up. 

He dreams of eventually providing a better home for his partner and himself. Your loan can be instrumental in making Luis’s dream a reality!

loans.use: buying more pigs and more produce to fatten them up

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Don Miguel de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el se dedica desde hace 40 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y frijol, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Miguel is 53 years old and lives in his own house with his life partner and their two children. He has been growing corn and beans for 40 years. When his crops are ready he sells them in the surrounding villages where he has many regular customers.

He is asking for a loan so he can buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pesticide, herbicide, etc. in order to improve the land shown in the photograph. This will allow him to continue to grow his crops as this is his only source of work and he will be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pesticide, herbicide, etc. to improve the land.

loans.name: Felicito Cristino

texts.es: Felicito de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, desde hace varios años el se dedica a la siembra de plátanos, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los diferentes mercados y ya tiene clientela establecida, el está solicitando por tercera ocasión un crédito para la compra de abonos ya que le ha ido muy bien en su trabajo y así poder seguirle dando a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Felicito is 42 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and their three children.  He has been growing bananas for the past few years.  When his crop is ready he sells it in the different markets and he already has some established customers. 

This is the third loan he is requesting so he can buy fertilizer. His work has been going very well so far and this will allow him to continue providing a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animal feed and piglets to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, re-bar, sand, gravel and cement so she can build a room in her house for the kitchen.

loans.name: Raynalda

texts.en:
Raynalda, who is 66 years old and married, lives in Puntod, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. For the past nine years, she has been a farmer. 

Raynalda is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla has always dreamed of opening her sari-sari store to support her children. 

She used her loan to to purchase inventories and to add up her additional capital for her business. She is now on her way to repaying the loan with her new profits.

loans.use: to purchase inventories and to add up her additional capital for her business

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania is a strong-willed woman who pushes her ability when it comes to her piggery business. She is a hands-on businesswoman and mother who never gets tired of supporting her family. 

Recently she availed a loan to purchase bags of animal feed. 

Aside from her project of concreting the pig pens, she thought of adding heads of pigs for commercial sale. 

Someday she hopes to open a meat shop in a nearby town.

loans.use: To purchase feed

loans.name: Maria Tatiana

texts.en:
23 year old Maria lives in Puerto Boyaca where she owns a store that sells bread and pastries, as well as other confectionary items. She has two children: one three year old daughter, and a recently born son whom she supports via the income from the store. 

Taught how to run this small business by her aunt, she has been selling her products to the local community since 2007. With a loan of $3,000,000COP she wants to be able to sell more consumables, and purchase a new grill for her delicious home made goods.  

With the help of this loan, she will therefore be able to attract more clients and eventually aspires to open up a new store. All this Maria dreams of achieving, so that she can improve not just her own quality of life, but that of her daughter and newly born son too.

loans.use: purchase a new grill for her home produced goods

loans.name: Ana Pastora
