Jeovani es un caficultor de 45 años, el lleva 30 años en el campo de la producción de café y cada día pone en práctica nuevas técnica de producción, Jeovani está casado con Olga Maribel con quien tiene 3 hijos y su mayor sueño es poder darles a sus pequeños la mejor educación y calidad de vida posible.
Jeovani quiere producir café orgánico lo que es una novedad en la región que permite tener mejores precios por el café que comercializa por medio de COCAFCAL, la certificación de las fincas a parte de dar mejores ganancias en precio ayuda a tener producciones más abundantes y a proteger el medio ambiente por medio de buenas prácticas agrícolas y aprovechando que las plagas tienen casi acabadas sus fincas aprovechara para replantarlas e iniciar la certificación con la plantación desde el inicio.
Jeovani solicita un crédito para convertir sus fincas a producción orgánica lo que le permitirá tener mejores ganancias por el café y darle mejores oportunidades a su familia.
Un crédito ayudara a Jeovani certificar su cafetal lo que le permitirá tener mejores cosechas, mejores precios por el café y por ende una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Jeovani is a coffee farmer, 45. He has 30 years' experience in the field of coffee production and each day he puts into practice new production techniques. Jeovani is married to Olga Maribel, with whom he has three children. His greatest dream is to be able to give his little ones the best education and quality of life possible.

Jeovani wants to produce organic coffee, which is new in the region. It allows him to have better prices for the coffee he sells by means of the COCAFAL certification of coffee farms. Apart from giving better gains in price, it helps to have more abundant production and to protect the environment via good agricultural practices, and benefits that pests are practically eliminated. He will take advantage to replant them and start the planting certification from the beginning.

Jeovani is applying for a loan to convert his farms to organic production, which will permit him to have better profits for the coffee and give better opportunities to his family. 

A loan will help Jeovani certify his coffee farm which will allow him to have better harvests, better prices for the coffee and, therefore, a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers, coffee plants, to pay for labor and to cover other expenses of the conversion of his coffee farm to organic.

loans.name: Mtenjera Group

texts.en: Married with three dependents, Falesi, aged 52, bakes and sells doughnuts to people in her community. She is depended on for the provision of the family’s needs and her children's education. Intending to improve her family’s welfare, Falesi will use the loan to buy more commodities for her business such as flour, sugar and cooking oil, in order to increase her profits. She plans to buy a plot of land for her children. The loans have helped her to become more independent than she was before.

loans.use: To buy flour, cooking oil and sugar

loans.name: Bogi

texts.ru: 51 летняя портниха Боги. Она живет на районе Файзабад.  В районе многие женщин и девушек занимаются шитьем женской одежды. Они хорошо знают свою работу. Боги рожденная женщина для этой сфере деятельностью. Она умная, активная, целеустремленная пунктуальная женщина. В таком возрасте она продвигает свою любимую работу, еще надолго она собирается продвигать работу. Боги имеет один сын и одну дочери в возрасте 28 и 27 лет. Сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, по причине что он не нашел себе подходящую работу в стране. Дочка замужем и живет отдельно, она тоже занимается шитьем женской одежды. В 2005 году Боги начала свой маленький бизнес. С помощью швейной работе она зарабатывает на жизнь. Боги хочет купить новую швейную машинку и расширить бизнес. По этой причине она просит кредит. Боги не кому больше обратится за кредитом. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Bogi is a 51-year-old dressmaker. She lives in Faizabad. In that region, many women and girls work sewing women's clothes. They know their job. Bogi was born for this sort of work. She is an intelligent, active, purposeful, punctual woman. At her age, she does her favorite work, and will continue to do so for a long time. Bogi has one son and one daughter aged 28 and 27 years old. Her son is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation since he couldn't find a good job in the country. Her daughter, who is married and lives apart, also works sewing women's clothes. In 2005, Bogi started a small business. With her sewing work she earns a living. Bogi wants to buy a new sewing machine and expand the business. Therefore, she is asking for the loan. Bogi doesn't have anyone else to turn to for the money. She believes in you and your support.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Cristina Magaly

texts.es:
En El sitio Santa Martha de la  parroquia Rio chico en Portoviejo, cada quince días se  reúnen las socias del Grupo de Crédito querer es poder de Rio chico. Este lugar se lo conoce por su vegetación donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura.
En este lugar vive  la señora Cristina, tiene 41 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de  19, 15 y 9 años que estudian universidad, colegio y escuela. El marido es comerciante.
Doña Cristina es una gran ama de casa que le gusta trabajar por el bienestar de su familia, ella se dedica al comercio, tiene un local en su casa en el cual tres a cuatro días por semana se dedica a la venta de  pollos ya sea enteros  o por libras, ella compra los pollos en una granja cercana y también está criando pollos en un pequeño galpón que construyo,  los cría y cuando están listos los vende en su local. Ella  lleva más de 9 años dedicada al comercio con lo cual se gana lo suyo.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar pollos para la venta diaria. Lleva más de 4 años en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos. Sus sueños son mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
In Santa Martha, Rio Chico parish, in Portoviejo, the members of the loan group, Querer es Poder de Rio Chico - Where There's a Will, There's a Way in Rio Chico- meet every fifteen days. This place is well known for their vegetation where most of the population works in agriculture.
Cristina lives there. She is 41, she has a partner and they have three children, ages 19, 15 and 9. They go to college, high school and grade school respectively. Her husband is a businessman.
Cristina is an outstanding home maker. She loves to work to provide for her family. She works in sales. She runs a store out of her home three to four times a week selling chicken, either whole or by the pound. She buys them from a nearby farm and she also raises her own in a small barn that she built. She takes care of them and once they are ready, she sells them at her store. She's been in the business for more than 9 years and she makes good money.
She will use this loan to buy chicken to sell daily. She's been a member of the group for four years and she likes it because these loans are of great help. Her dream is to improve her quality of life and her family's.

loans.use: to buy chicken.

loans.name: Twekambe Kogere United Group

texts.en: John is a married male with 4 children, 3 of whom are attending school in Kasese, Uganda. He is a member of Twekambe Kogere United group, living in Kasese, Uganda. He deals in mechanics and does farming for additional income. The farming business faces the challenges of pests and diseases. John describes himself as being honest and he has hopes of educating his children to the university level. He needs a loan to buy fertilizers and manure for his fields.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure for his fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Vilanculos província de Inhambane tem 27 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é pai de 3 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pelo seu tio que se encontra em Vilanculos, enviando lhes dinheiro por mês.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2014, este é o seu 2º empréstimo na Hluvuku, com o qual pretende adquirir uma geleira para sua casa. Sendo que o 1º foi aplicado para Habitação.
Futuramente pretende ampliar a sua residência para dar conforto a sua família. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Antonio was born in Vilanculos, province of Inhambane. He is 27, he is married with three small children. He is also responsible for his uncle in Vilanculos and he sends him money every month.
He started working with Hluvuku in 2014. This is his second loan with them, and he will like to use it to buy a fridge. He used his first loan to make home improvements.
In the future, he will like to expand his home to make it more comfortable for his family. His biggest challenge is to provide his children with an education.

loans.use: to buy a fridge

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen es de la ciudad de Caacupé, viene de una familia humilde, su padre es comerciante y es quien lo ayuda en todo siempre.
El principal objetivo de Carmen es terminar  su carrera y comenzar a trabajar como contadora  publica, ya que ella está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad. Es una persona luchadora que se esfuerza por sus metas.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Carmen is from the city of Caacupé. She comes from a humble family, and her father is a businessman and is the one who helps her through everything. 

Carmen’s main goal is to finish her degree and begin working as a public accountant, as she has been studying for a career in accounting. She is a determined person that strives for her goals.  

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to pay for her university fees and to continue studying as she has been.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Safarmo

texts.ru: Сафармо заботливая женщина. Ей 57 лет, замужем и живет со своей семьей в городе Куляб. Сафармо занимается шитьем в течение двадцати лет. Она научила много молодых девушек, потому что она считает, что у каждой женщины должно быть ремесло. Сейчас Сафармо необходимо купить материалы и нитки, но у неё нет достаточно денег. По этой причине она обратилась за кредитом, надеясь, что с вашей помощью она сможет расширить свой  бизнес.
texts.en: Safarmo is a caring woman. She is 57 years old, married and lives with her family in the city of Kulyob. Safarmo has been sewing for twenty years. She taught many young girls because she believes that every woman should have a skill. Now, Safarmo need to buy the material and thread, but she does not have enough money. Hence, she applied for a loan in the hope that with your help she will be able to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and thread to expand her business.

loans.name: Hokima

texts.ru: Хокима очень рада, что есть люди которые поддержать ее. Она купила себе желаемую машинку и продвигала свою работу. Хокима сейчас имеет больше клиентов и очень рада, что имеет постоянную работу и ежедневный доход. Она успешно погасила предыдуший кредит. Хокима еще раз обратилась за кредитом, с планами отремонтировать свой дом. По причине, что она  не смогла копить деньги на ремонт.  Хокима хочет улучшить жилищные условия жизни семьи. Она верит в Вам и на Вашу поддержку. Хокима будет рада на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Hokima is very glad that there are people who support her. She bought herself the car she wantes and promoted her work. Hokima currently has more customers and is very pleased that she has a steady job and a daily income. She has successfully repaid a previous loan. Hokima has again applied for a loan with plans to renovate her house. However, she was unable to save money to make the repairs. Hokima wants to improve her family's living conditions. She believes in you and in your support. Hokima will be happy with your support.

loans.use: renovate her house.

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Зебинисо умная и цивилизованная женщина. Она жительница Кургантюбинского города. Ей 49 лет, замужем и мать двоих детей. Ее муж является трудовым мигрантом России. Сама Зебинисо учительница. Она очень любит детей и является хорошим предпринимателем для них. Она выбрала эту профессию, чтобы направлять детей на верный путь. Так как сейчас лето, и в Таджикистане, особенно в городе Курган-Тюбе жарче, чем в других точках республики, Зебинисо хочет купить и установить кондиционер в доме, но её зарплата этого ей не позволяет. Поэтому она обратилась за кредитом и надеется на положительный ответ с вашей стороны.
texts.en: Zebiniso is an intelligent and civilized woman. She lives in Qurgan-Tube. She is 49 years old, married, and the mother of two children. Her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. Zebiniso is a  teacher. She loves children and is a good caretaker for them. She chose this profession to guide children on the right path. Since it's summer in Tajikistan, the city of Qurgan-Tube is hot, hotter than elsewhere in the country.  Zebiniso wants to buy and install air conditioning in the house, but she can't afford it on her salary. So, she applied for a loan and hopes for a positive response from you.

loans.use: to purchase air conditioning.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Mujeres Al Poder Group

texts.es: Doña Maritza es la presidenta de Banco Mujer Mujeres Al Poder, tiene 50 años, es viuda y madre de cinco hijos. Actualmente vive con un hijo menor de edad que depende de ella y su pareja, la cual tiene muchos años de convivir con él. Vive en la comunidad llamada Duacari, zona rural del cantón de Pococí. Ésta  señora es de nacionalidad nicaragüense y vive hace más de 20 años en Costa Rica. Es este país que le ha dado la oportunidad de trabajar y con eso salir adelante con su familia. Doña Maritza cuenta con una pequeña parcela, donde se dedica a trabajar en el desarrollo y engorde de ganado, la cual es la actividad principal que le genera ingresos a su hogar, ella junto con su compañero trabajan en conjunto. También tiene otras actividades paralelas que es la cría cerdos y pollos y, la siembra de diferentes cultivos. Este es su quinto crédito y se va a invertir en la compra terneros e insumos para los mismos. Éste Banco Mujer se ha caracterizado por su puntualidad en los pagos, y los financiamientos les han permitido consolidar sus negocios, por eso solicitan otra vez préstamo para reforzar sus actividades, asi crecer y superarse. Junto a Doña Maritza conforman el grupo 3 socias más que van a invertir en la actividad de ganadería.
texts.en:
Maritza is president of the women’s bank, Mujeres Al Poder (Women in Power). She is a widow and mother of five children. Currently, she lives with her younger son that depends on her and her partner, a man whom she has spent many years living with. 

She lives in a community called Duacari, in the rural area of the Pococí district. She is of Nicaraguan nationality and has lived in Costa Rica for more than 20 years. It is this country that has given her the opportunity to work and with that to support her family. 

Maritza has a small plot of land where she raises and fattens livestock, which is the main activity that provides an income for her household. She works together with her partner. 

She also has other activities – raising pigs and chickens and planting various crops. This is her fifth loan and she is going to invest in the purchase of calves and supplies for them. 

This women’s bank is known for its punctual payments, and the financing has enabled them to consolidate their businesses. For this reason, they are asking for a loan again to strengthen their businesses, so they grow and succeed. 

Along with Maritza, the group includes three other members that are going to invest in the livestock business.

loans.use: to buy calves, feed, vitamins and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase poultry feed.

loans.name: Steven

texts.en: Steven is 67 years old and married with 4 children, one of whom is attending school, living in Kasese, Uganda. He is a businessman selling matooke (bananas) and has been in business since 2001. He works hard for 12 hours a day and earns his side income from farming. He requests a loan to buy matooke for selling. He has a dream of expanding his business, but faces the challenge of inadequate capital.

loans.use: to buy matooke for selling

loans.name: Erisa

texts.en:
Erisa is 28 years married man with three children; two attend school. They live in Kasese Uganda. 

Erisa sells crude salt and also earns income from motorcycle transportation plus salt pans. He has been in this business since 2005 working 10 hours and six days a week. This has enhanced him experience of management. 

Erisa is a hardworking person but faced with poor climatic conditions, like heavy rainfall. 

He intends to use the loan to buy crude salt to maintain his customers.

loans.use: to buy crude salt.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard lives in Hoima, Uganda. He buys and sells beans, maize, and g-nuts (peanuts), among other items. 

He also gets additional income from farming. 

Benard has a dream of expanding and developing his business into new markets as well as educating his children. However, price fluctuations hinder his business. 

Benard will use the loan facility to buy more beans and maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more beans and maize.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 35 year-old married male with six children; five attendschool. 

Robert used the previous loan to buy clothes for making school uniforms and he gets additional income from farming. This has enabled him to pay off his loan and keep his business running. 

Robert started his business to pay school fees for all his children, and he is acquiring a loan to buy more material to make uniforms to sell. 

He hopes to expand his business, although competition and high rental costs are challenges he faces.

loans.use: to buy material to make uniforms.

loans.name: Cécile

texts.fr: Agée de 36 ans, Cécile est une femme mariée qui habite à Baguida. Mère de trois enfants, Cécile vend de la bouillie préparée à base du maïs et de la farine de blé afin de  trouver son gain favorable. Cécile s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter un sac de maïs et des bols de farine, Cécile nécessite ce prêt pour financer sa commande et réaliser plus de gains pour l’épanouissement de son foyer.
texts.en: Cécile, aged 36, is a married woman living in Baguida. A mother of three, she sells porridge made from corn and wheat flour in order to make a profit. She gets her supplies once a month at the market. To purchase a sack of corn and tubs of flour, Cécile needs this loan to finance her order and realize more profit for her household to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of corn and 10 tubs of wheat flour

loans.name: Tusingwire

texts.en:
Tusingwire is a 42 year old male, single with four children who attend school. They live in Kasese Uganda. 

He sells crude salt working 10 hours a day, six days a week, and he earns side income from salt pans. He has been in business since 2009 and has a dream of expanding his business. 

However, he is faced with poor climatic conditions like heavy rainfall which affect salt formation. He is asking for credit to buy crude salt.

loans.use: to buy crude salt.

loans.name: Shafoat

texts.ru: Шафоат 28 летняя жена и мать. Она из района Файзабад. Шафоат живет вместе  свекровью, тестю, мужем и детьми. Тестю 63 года. Свекровью 61 лет. Мужу 31 лет. Шафоат заботливая и жизнелюбивая женщина. Она помогает мужу обеспечить семью, предоставляя услуги портнихи. Шафоат 3 года занимается шитьем женской одежды. У нее есть  одна единственная машинка, которая с помощью ее она зарабатывает. Нынешняя швейная машинка хорошо не выполняет свои функции. И Шафоат решила взять кредит и за счет кредита приобрести швейную машинку. Е у них дома идет ремонт, и для купли стройматериалы не хватает денежных средств. Шафоат решила помочь мужу приобрести стройматериалы на оставшуюся часть денег от кредита.
texts.en: Shafoat is a 28-year-old wife and mother. She is from Faizabad. Shafoat lives with her mother-in-law, father-in-law, husband and children. Her father-in-law is 63, and her mother-in-law is 61. Her husband is 31. Shafoat is a caring and active woman. She helps her husband provide for the family, working as a dressmaker. Shafoat has been sewing women's clothes for three years. She has only one machine that she uses to earn her living. Her current sewing machine does not work well. Shafoat decided to take out a loan and with that loan buy a sewing machine. Their home is being renovated, and they don't have enough money to buy building materials. Shafoat decided to help her husband to buy construction materials with the rest of the money from the loan.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine and construction materials.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is 32 years old and married with 2 children, aged 9 and 6, both of whom are attending school, living in Kasese, Uganda. James is a hard-working businessman selling crude salt, and he earns his side income from salt pans. He has been in this business since 2008 and has gained experience in business maintenance; however, he is faced with the problems of climatic changes and poor means of transport. He wants money to buy crude salt and to fulfill his dreams of educating his children.

loans.use: to buy crude salt for selling

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a male, aged 48, who is married with 13 children, 8 of whom are attending school. He deals in a pork butchery business and earns an additional income from rental houses. The business faces the challenge of limited capital to maintain it. He is a hard-working and honest man who has great hopes of diversifying his business. He needs money to buy pigs for slaughtering and sale.

loans.use: to buy pigs for slaughtering and sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy baking materials like sugar, baking flour and milk.

loans.name: Claribel

texts.en:
Claribel is 20 years old and lives in Puerto Salgar, located in the region of Cundinamarca. Here she has been running a store since 2013 by herself in order to support her two sons, aged 4 and 2 respectively.

In order to be successful she needs to buy more stock to sell, and would like to re-do the accompanying tejo pitch (a game similar to boules played by the locals) in order to attract more clients. 

Claribel is very passionate about running a successful store, and wishes to reach a level of sustainability so that one day she can afford a new home for herself and her two young boys. With your help she can make this dream come true!

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell and to re-do the accompanying tejo pitch

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Essi est une femme mariée âgée de 32 ans. Mère de trois enfants, Essi vit à Adakpamé pour entreprendre ses activités. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Essi vend des pagnes dans le quartier afin d’avoir un revenu. Essi s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci d’avoir un nouveau stock, Essi sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des pièces de pagnes qu’elle pourra vendre et faire une bonne rentabilité afin de soutenir son mari à subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en: Essi is a married woman, 32 years old, living in Adakpamé to operate her business. To respond to the needs of her family, she sells 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) in the district to have an income. She gets her supplies three time a month at the market. Concerned about having a new stock of goods, Essi is requesting this loan to purchase lengths of ‘pagne’ cloth that she will be able to sell for a good profit, so as to support her husband in meeting day-to-day family needs.

loans.use: to purchase 6 lengths of 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Gulzada

texts.ru: Гулзада, 32 года, замужем, есть дочь. У нее среднее образование, уже 10 лет занимается земледелием и животноводством. Сегодня в хозяйстве Гулзады есть земельный участок мерою 0,50 Га, где она выращивает картофель и есть 3 коровы, 19 овец, 5 лошадей. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 17,500 сомов (KGS). Она очень трудолюбива, отзывчива и ответственна. Гулзада обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS), на который она купит телят для увеличения поголовья. Гулзада является лидером группы "Алмалуу-1", всего в группе 3 человека. Доходы от кредита позволят ей увеличить хозяйство и отремонтировать дом.
texts.en: Gulzada is 32 years old, married and has a daughter. She has a secondary education. For the last 10 years, she has been working in farming and animal husbandry. Today, the farm has land measuring 0.50 hectares where she grows potatoes, and she has 3 cows, 19 sheep, and 5 horses. Her monthly income averages 17,500 som (KGS). She is very hard-working, responsive and responsible. Gulzada asked the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy calves. Gulzada is the leader of the group "Almaluu-1", a group of 3 people. Proceeds from the loan will enable her to expand her farm and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy some calves to expand her herd.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. Erlinda is able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she took a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce

loans.name: Soraya

texts.en: Soraya is 38 years old and lives in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and has four children. Soraya owns and operates a water-refilling station in their local community for a living. She has been doing this for two years. She has requested a loan of PHP 49,900 to purchase a water pump. In the future, Soraya hopes to save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities. Not only is she doing her hobby, she earns an income as well. At the age of 51, and married, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. She grabbed the opportunity to become a full-fledged member of PMPC. She credits to the cooperative her capital in supporting her gardening activities. Recently, she applied for a loan for land redemption. In the future, Erlinda hopes to have an additional income from her redemptive land.

loans.use: to get a land redemption

location.town: Plaridel-Upper Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occide

loans.name: Nurperi

texts.ru: Нурпери, 29 лет, замужем, есть 2 детей дошкольников. У нее высшее образование, с 2012 года работает в детском саду преподавателем киргизского языка. Ее заработная плата- около 6,300 сом (KGS) в месяц. Нурпери обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для проведения внутреннего ремонта дома, а именно приобретет гипсокартон и уголки для утепления, цемент, песок и прочее. Дети Нурпери маленькие, поэтому вовремя проведенный ремонт позволит улучшить условия проживания семьи. Доходы от заработной платы Нурпери будет вкладывать в дальнейшее благоустройство дома.
texts.en: Nurperi is 29 years old, married, and has 2 preschool children. She graduated in 2012 and works as a Kyrgyz language teacher in a kindergarten. Her monthly income is about 6,300 som (KGS). Nurperi asked the bank "Bai -Tushum" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase building materials to renovate her house, namely to get drywall, drywall tape, insulation, cement, sand and so on. Nurperi's children are still small, so now is the time to make the repairs to improve the living conditions of the family. Nurperi will continue to invest her wages in home improvement.

loans.use: buy drywall, metal corners for insulation, cement, sand etc. for making home improvements.

loans.name: Kossiwavi

texts.fr: Âgée de 32ans, Kossiwavi mère de 02 enfants(07 et 03) dont 01 seul scolarisé revend des produits alimentaires(boisson, riz, tomate...) qu'elle achète au Grand Marché et revend dans sa boutique. Elle sollicite un quatrième crédit pour acheter des marchandises afin de répondre aux désirs des clients. Comme perspectives d'avenir, elle espère assurer le bien - être de la famille tout en rendant pérenne son activité. Kossiwavi a démarré l'activité en 2013.
texts.en: Kossiwavi, aged 32, is the mother of two children, aged 7 and 3, of whom one is in school. Kossiwavi sells grocery items (beverages, rice, tomatoes, …) that she buys at the Grand Market and resells in her shop. She is requesting a 4th loan to purchase some merchandise in order to respond to the wishes of her customers. For the future, she hopes to ensure her family’s well-being while making her business sustainable. Kossiwavi began her business in 2013.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items

loans.name: Koudjo

texts.fr: Koudjo, homme de 37ans avec 05 enfants en charge est revendeur d'articles de quincailleries depuis 2013. Il vit à Lomé avec sa famille. Pour satisfaire les désirs de cette dernière, il a entamé le commerce d'articles de quincailleries. Son stock actuel est en baisse, il voudrait se réapprovisionner raison pour laquelle Mr Koudjo sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de marchandises. Avec ce stock il compte accroître ses recettes.
texts.en: Koudjo, a 37-year-old man, has five children to support. He has been a retailer of hardware items since 2013. He lives in Lomé with his family. To satisfy the wishes of his family, he began a business selling hardware. His current stock is low. He would like to stock up again, so he is requesting a loan from WAGES to purchase some merchandise. With this stock, he plans on growing his income.

loans.use: to purchase hardware items

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita finds pleasure in gardening. Not only is it her hobby, but she earns an income from it as well. At the age of 43 and a widow, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family. 

She has taken the opportunity to become a full pledge member of PMPC. She credits the cooperative with the capital for supporting her gardening activities. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers. In the future, Anita wishes to become the supplier of coconuts in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase gardening tools and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets and feed.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a 46-year-old married hard-working woman with five children, 3 of whom attend school. She lives in Kamwenge, Uganda and deals in decoration and outside catering. She also supplements this with farming to help her pay school fees for her children. She plans to expand her business areas outside Kamwenge, though she is limited by inadequate capital.

She is requesting a loan to buy more plastic chairs for her business.

loans.use: to buy more plastic chairs for her business.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a 39-year-old hard-working married man with eight children. He lives in Kamwenge, Uganda. He used his previous loan to pay workers on his farm. He still deals in farming, alongside buying and selling of produce to earn himself an extra income. He started this business so as to earn a living. He still hopes to be a modern farmer; however, his main challenge is inadequate capital. 

He is requesting a loan to mulch his coffee farm.

loans.use: to mulch his coffee farm.

loans.name: Maendelo Ii Group

texts.fr: Chirhuza est un homme d’affaires qui s’entraide avec sa femme, membre de la banque villageoise, Maendelo II, client de l’IMF Hekima, âgé de 46 ans, père de 6 enfants dont cinq vont à l’école et 1 est encore gosse. Il est vendeur des divers produits de médicaments modernes dans une pharmacie de la ville depuis 4 ans. Il commença son busines avec de fonds reçu de son salaire quand, il fut infirmier. Il va acheter des antibiotiques, des sérums et anti inflammatoires. Il souhaite accroitre son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, il remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en:
Chirhuza is a businessman. He and his wife mutually support one another. A member of the 'banc villageois’ called Maendelo II, he is a client of the microfinance institution Hekima. He is 46 years old and the father of six children, of whom five go to school, and one is still very young. 

Chirhuza has been a vendor of a variety of modern medicines at a pharmacy in town, for four years. He began his business with funds from his salary, when he was a nurse. He is going to purchase some antibiotics, serums, and anti-inflammatories. His wish is to grow his business and provide schooling and food for his children. In conclusion, he thanks Hekima for its support of unbanked. entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to purchase antibiotics, serums, and anti-inflammatories

loans.name: Adjatougbe

texts.fr: Adjatougbé vit avec son mari et leurs 06 enfants à Lomé. Elle revend des charbons de bois,du bois, des cadres...) à domicile depuis 2002. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients, elle demande un crédit à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises. Elle souhaite agrandir son activité et assurer l'avenir de la famille.
texts.en: Adjatougbé lives with her husband and their six children in Lomé. She has been selling charcoal, wood, and frames at her home since 2002. To respond better to customer needs, she is asking for a loan from WAGES to purchase some merchandise. Her wish is to expand her business and ensure her family’s future.

loans.use: to purchase firewood and charcoal

loans.name: Aguptus

texts.en:
Aguptus, 45, is a hardworking married man with five children, aged 5,13,15,17 and 20, living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is employed as a herdsman. He deals in cattle rearing and fattening as his main source of income. 

He started the business so that he would be self employed since he had worked for other people for so long. He wants to develop into a modern commercial farmer, though he is challenged by inadequate capital and unreliable herdsmen droughts. 

He intends to use this loan to buy more bulls for fattening and to pay the school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more bulls for fattening and to pay the school fees for his children.

loans.name: Burul

texts.ru: Бурул, 52 года, замужем, есть 4 детей. У нее среднее образование, уже много лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. В хозяйстве Бурул есть земельный участок мерою 0,40 Га, где она выращивает кукурузу и 4 коровы, 30 овец, 6 лошадей. Также с супругом занимаются пчеловодством, есть 40 ящиков пчелосемей.  Бурул очень трудолюбива, отзывчива и спокойная. Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS), на приобретение овец для увеличения поголовья. Бурул является участником группы "Алмалуу-1", всего в группе 3 человека. Доходы от кредита позволят ей увеличить хозяйство и построить большой сарай для скота.
texts.en: Burul is 52 years old, married and has 4 children. She has a secondary education and has, for many years, been working in farming and livestock. Burul's land measures 0.40 hectares, where she grows corn, and she has 4 cows, 30 sheep, and 6 horses. Also she and her husband are bee keepers. They have 40 bee boxes. Burul is very hard-working, responsive and quiet. She appealed to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS), to buy sheep. Burul is a member of the group "Almaluu-1", a group of 3 people. Proceeds from the loan will enable her to expand her farm and and build a large barn for livestock.

loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to increase her livestock.

loans.name: Kymbat

texts.ru: Кымбат, 39 лет, замужем, есть 5 детей, старшие студенты, двое младших - школьники. У Кымбат среднее образование, работает в школе учителем. Также уже 8 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. В хозяйстве Кымбат есть земельный участок мерою 0,60 Га, где она выращивает кукурузу и 3 коровы, 25 овец, 3 лошади. Бурул очень трудолюбива, отзывчива и спокойная. Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS), на приобретение овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Кымбат является участником группы "Алмалуу-1", всего в группе 3 человека. Доходы от кредита позволят ей увеличить хозяйство и построить сарай для скота.
texts.en: Kymbat is 39 years old, married and has 5 children. The older ones are university students, and the two youngest are in school. Kymbat has a secondary education and works as a school teacher. She also has 8 years of experience in farming and livestock. Kymbat's farm land where she grows corn measure 0.60 hectares, and she has 3 cows, 25 sheep and three horses. Burul is very hard-working, responsive and quiet. She asked the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS), to buy sheep to increase her livestock. Kymbat is a member of the group "Almaluu-1", a group of 3 people. Proceeds from the loan will enable her to expand her farm and build a barn for livestock.

loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
MAHAMADOU  est le Monsieur  qui tient la corde du mouton  sur la photo ; c’est un cultivateur Malien, âgé de 49 ans, marié et père de 7 enfants âgés de 3 mois à  17 ans dont deux  scolarisés. Sa femme est une ménagère.
Il est non scolarisé, et exerce l’activité d’embouche et d’élevage il y a 20 ans de cela. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés de sa localité et liquide ses animaux dans les mêmes marchés. Le bénéfice qu’il gagne lui permet de faire face aux charges de sa famille.
MAHAMADOU  fait recourt au RMCR pour développer son activité en augmentant son chiffre d’affaire.
Ayant appris ce métier, il se sent à l’aise de l’exercer car il se voit  participer au développement économique de sa famille en plus de l’amour qu’il l’apporte.
MAHAMADOU  est souvent confronté au problème de vente car parfois il donne ses animaux à crédit à l’exportateur. Son rêve est de devenir  lui-même un grand exportateur dans les jours à venir.
texts.en:
Mahamadou is the gentleman holding the sheep by a rope on the photo. He is a 49-year-old Malian farmer, married with seven children, whose ages range from three months to 17 years, including two who attend school. His wife is a homemaker.

He did not attend school, and has been raising and fattening livestock for the past 20 years. He restocks in local markets and sells off his animals in the same markets. The profit he earns enables him to meet his family's expenses.

Mahamadou calls upon RMCR to expand his business by increasing his turnover. Having learned his trade, he feels comfortable pursuing it because in addition to the love he has for his family he is able to participate in their economic development.

Mahamadou is often faced with problems selling his animals because he sometimes gives them on credit to the exporter. His dream is to become himself a major exporter in the near future.

loans.use: buy livestock for resale

loans.name: Adoj

texts.fr: Adjo est une femme mariée âgée de 28 ans qui vit dans le quartier d’Adidogomé pour entreprendre son activité. Mère de trois enfants, Adjo vend des produits d’alimentations générales et des céréales dans le quartier pour subvenir aux divers besoins. Adjo s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Adjo demande ce crédit pour commander des bols de maïs afin de bien vendre et avoir plus de bénéfice. Adjo désire réaliser des bénéfices pour soutenir son mari dans les charges de la famille et permettre une bonne éducation à ses enfants.
texts.en: Adjo is a married woman, 28 years old, living in the Adidogomé district to operate her business. A mother of three, she sells grocery items and grains in the district to meet her various needs. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. Adjo is asking for this loan to order tubs of corn in order to do well in her sales and to have more profit. Her wish is to realize profits for supporting her husband in covering family expenses and for allowing a good education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 100 tubs of corn

loans.name: Badenya Group

texts.fr: Moumoune  est membre du groupe Badenya  marié et père de 3 enfants âgé de 8 à 14 ans, il est analphabète, réside  au Mali, âgés de 64 ans c’est lui qui tient la corde du mouton en main. Il  fait l’embouche des moutons. Les rêves et les espoirs de Moumoune est d’avoir plus d’argent pour acheter plus de moutons, après ses ventes de tirer plus de bénéfice pour subvenir aux besoins familiale. Par manque de moyen financier il fait recourt au RMCR pour pouvoir mener son activité. Il s’approvisionne et fait ses ventes dans les foires hebdomadaires de sa zone. Il peut  gagner  comme bénéfice 25 000 FCFA après ses ventes. Le prêt l’aidera à survenir aux besoins de sa famille : santé, scolaire etc.il y a plus de 15 ans il  fait l’embouche des moutons. Les obstacles auxquels il peut rencontrer est souvent la chute des prix.
texts.en:
Moumoune is a member of the group Badenya. He is a married father of three children, aged 8 to 14 years old. Illiterate, 64 years old, and residing in Mali, he is the one in the photo holding the sheep’s rope. Moumoune raises sheep. His dreams and hopes include having more money to purchase more sheep in order to have more profit upon selling them, so as to support his family. 

Lacking the financial means, he has turned to RMCR to be able to carry out his business. He gets his supplies and makes his sales at the weekly fairs in the area. As for profits, he can earn 25,000 francs CFA after his sales. The loan will help him to meet family needs: healthcare, school fees, etc. 

He has been fattening sheep for fifteen years. The obstacles he may encounter include frequent drops in prices.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to sell

loans.name: David

texts.es: David de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, él se dedica a la reparación y venta de joyas (aritos, cadenas, pulseras, anillos, entre otros) se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 10 años su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes por la calidad con que realiza su trabajo, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de herramientas y demás accesorios que utiliza en su trabajo para poder darle una buena atención a sus clientes y el poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: David, who is 37 years old, lives in a house that he owns with his wife. He works in the repair and sale of jewelry (earrings, necklaces, bracelets, rings, among others). He has had this occupation for 10 years. His business is located in his place of residence, and he has many clients because of the quality of his work. He is asking for a loan for the purchase of tools and other accessories that he uses in his work to be able to attend to his clients and be able to have a better economic income.

loans.use: to buy tools and other accessories that he uses to make jewelry.

loans.name: Claire

texts.fr: Agée de 46 ans, Claire est une femme mariée qui vit avec un enfant à sa charge à Adidogomé. Pour favoriser son épanouissement, Claire est une marchande ambulante qui  vend des pagnes en parcourant tout son quartier. Claire réalise son gain grâce à cette activité et s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour acheter des pièces de pagne, Claire demande ce fonds pour favoriser sa commande et avoir une marge bénéficiaire qui l’aidera à mieux contribuer aux charges de la famille.
texts.en: Claire, aged 46, is a married woman living with her child she supports in Adidogomé. For her child to thrive, Claire is an itinerant merchant selling 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) by going throughout her district. She makes a profit, thanks to this business. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. To purchase lengths of ‘pagne’ cloth, she is asking for these funds to put in an order for the merchandise and to have a profit margin that will help her to do better covering family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 30 lengths of 'pagne' cloth

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Eya est une femme mariée âgée de 32 ans et  vit à Adidogomé pour entreprendre ses activités. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Eya  fait des soins de beauté dans le quartier en se promenant afin d’avoir un revenu. Eya s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci de satisfaire ses clients, Eya sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des vernis et des produits de beauté pour améliorer sa prestation et faire une bonne rentabilité afin de soutenir son mari à subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en: Eya is a married woman, 32 years old, living in Adidogomé to operate her business. To respond to the needs of her family, she sells beauty products in the district by going door to door, so as to make an income. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. Concerned about satisfying her customers, Eya is requesting this loan to purchase some nail polish and beauty products for improving her offerings and making a good profit, so as to support her husband in meeting day-to-day family needs.

loans.use: to purchase 25 of nail polish, 10 packets of nail files, and scissors

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de tortas y hamburguesas desde hace 5 años, su negocio está ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada,  la joven vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas, ella solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario para elaborar sus tortas y hamburguesas como: pan, tomates, cebollas, mayonesa, mortadelas, entre otros ingredientes y poder tener mejores ganancias y poder darle a sus hijas una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The young woman, whose face has been pixelated since she is 29 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has worked in the sale of sandwiches and hamburgers for 5 years. Her business is located close to her place of residence in a highly circulated area. She lives in a house that she owns with her two daughters. She asks for a loan which will allow her to buy everything necessary to make her sandwiches and hamburgers, such as: bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, bologna, among other ingredients, and be able to have better profits and give her daughters a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bread, tomatoes, onions, mayonnaise, bologna, among other ingredients.

loans.name: Akoélé

texts.fr: Akoélé est une femme mariée et âgée de 52 ans vit à Adidogomé avec un enfant à sa charge. Akoélé s’évertue de mettre à disposition de son ménage sa contribution pour son épanouissement. C’est en cela qu’elle prépare des ignames frites et des spaghettis dans son quartier et trouve une satisfaction du profit qu’elle tire. Akoélé s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci de répondre aux besoins de ses consommateurs, Akoélé nécessite ce crédit pour acheter une calebasse d’ignames afin de bien faire sa friture et maximiser son profit.
texts.en: Akoélé is a married woman, 52 years old, living in Adidogomé with a child in her care. Akoélé makes every effort to help out her household for it to thrive. To that end, she makes fried yams and spaghetti in her district, and she is fairly happy with the profit she makes. She gets her supplies twice a month at the market. Concerned about responding to the needs of her consumers, she needs this loan to purchase a calabash of yams to do well frying them and maximizing her profit.

loans.use: to purchase a calabash of yams

loans.name: Willian Alexander

texts.es: William de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, él posee un pequeño chalet donde vende golosinas, refrescos, aguas, comida, etc. tiene varios años de tener su negocio el cual está ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor y así continuar con sus ventas ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: William, who is 30 years old, lives in a house he owns with his mother. He owns a small house where he sells candy, sodas, water, food, etc. He has had this business for several years, which is located in his place of residence. With what he receives from his sales, he manages to settle some of his household expenses. He is asking for a loan for the purchase of more merchandise at wholesale, and be able to continue with his sales, as this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy candy, sodas, water, food, etc.

loans.name: Chris

texts.en:
Chris is a 44-year-old, hardworking, married man with six children, aged 3, 8, 12, 14, 16 and 20 years, living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in cattle rearing and fattening as his main source of income. He started the business to earn a living and look after his children. He has a motive of developing to a modern, commercial farmer, though he is challenged by inadequate capital, unreliable herdsmen, drought and small loan periods.
 
He intends to use the loan to buy more bulls for fattening.

loans.use: to buy more bulls for fattening.

loans.name: Estelle

texts.fr: Agée de 30 ans, Estelle est une femme qui vit à Adidogomé avec trois  personnes à sa charge.  Pour avoir son revenu, Estelle prépare et vend de la boisson locale communément appelée Tchoukoutchou faite à base du mil. Pour répondre efficacement aux besoins, Estelle s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Estelle demande ce crédit pour commander des bols de mil afin de réaliser encore plus de revenus pour soutenir  les charges quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: Estelle, aged 30, is a woman who lives in Adidogomé with three persons in her care. To have an income, she makes and sells a local drink commonly called Tchoukoutchou made from millet. To respond effectively to the need, Estelle gets her supplies once a month at the market. She is asking for this loan to order tubs of millet to realize still more revenues for covering day-to-day family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 86 tubs of millet

loans.name: Jose Salvador

texts.es: Don Jose de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, él se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos maíz y maicillo desde hace 15 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abono, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía y así poder continuar con su trabajo para poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Done Jose, who is 59 years old, lives in a house that he owns with his wife. His occupation has been farming staple grains, corn and sorghum, for the last 15 years. He sells his products in the different markets that are located near his home. He is asking for a loan to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, herbicide, etc., and improve the piece of land which is shown in the photograph, and be able to continue with his work to have a better economic income.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. and to improve his piece of land.

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es: Amalia tiene 49 años de edad y vive en casa propia junto a su esposo con quien lleva varios años de casado. Amalia es dueña de una  tienda en su casa de habitación en la cual distribuye productos básicos  de primera necesidad,  ya son nueve años de contar con la tienda por lo que es  muy  conocida  en la zona y muchas personas la prefieren. Amalia anteriormente solicito un crédito para invertir en la reparación del techo de su vivienda y debido a la grata experiencia y cumplir su gran objetivo,  Amalia desea seguir con las mejoras del hogar que consisten en la construcción de un  cuarto dormitorio, por lo que vuelve a solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de: ladrillo, arena, cemento, lamina y madera para la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio y brindar así una mejor calidad d vida a su familia.
texts.en: Amalia is 49 years old and lives in a house she owns with her husband, to whom she has been married for several years. Amalia is the owner of a store in her house, where she distributes staple products. It has been nine years since she has had the store, which is why she is well-known in the area and many people prefer her services. Previously, Amalia asked for a loan to invest in the repair of the roof of her house, and due to the rewarding experience and having been able to achieve her big goal, Amalia wishes to continue with home improvements, that consist of the construction of a sleeping room. This is why she asks for a new loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of: brick, sand, cement, metal, and wood for the construction of a sleeping room, and give a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase brick, sand, cement, metal, and wood for the construction of a sleeping room, and give a better quality of life to her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy land for construction.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa for resale to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials like sand, cement and timber to construct her house.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Agée de 66 ans, Ayélé est une femme mariée et mère de sept enfants. Ayélé vit à Baguida et est une revendeuse de bouillie  préparée à base du sorgho accompagnée des beignets dans le quartier. Ce commerce lui permet de venir en aide aux besoins de sa famille et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire. Ayélé s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des bols du sorgho et des beignets, Ayélé demande ce prêt pour atteindre ses objectifs et gagner une bonne marge bénéficiaire.
texts.en:
66-year-old Ayele is a married mother of seven. She lives in Baguida and is a retailer of sorghum-based mush with fritters in her neighborhood.

This business enables her to help meet her family's needs and make good profit margins. Ayele resupplies twice a month at the market.

Ayele is requesting this loan to order bowls of sorghum and fritters, so she can meet her goals and make good profit margins.

loans.use: buy 24 bowls of sorghum and 48 fritters

loans.name: Banco Mujer Buscando El Triunfo Group

texts.es: Doña Luz tiene mucho tiempo de formar parte del Banco Mujer Buscando el Triunfo. Actaualmente es la presidenta del grupo y está compuesto por 5 socias de la misma comunidad llamada Chase, la cual es reserva indígena. Ellas tiene la experiencia necesaria para las diferentes actividades que desarrollan, las cuales son el comercio y el sector agropecuario. Esta señora tiene 45 años, es divorciada de su primer esposo, tiene 3 hijos que dependen de ella, 2 cursan la secundaria y uno la primaria. Actualmente cuenta con un compañero que la apoya en sus labores diarias. Su compañero por asuntos de trabajo se ve obligado a pasar más tiempo fuera de la casa, ya que trabaja en construcción y por temporadas debe estar en otras partes del país;  Esto hace que la situación económica de la familia se vea muy afectada, ya que ella debe satisface todas la necesidades de sus hijos con los ingresos que le generan sus actividades productivas. Inició la venta de refrescos y golosinas en su casa, y ahora ella quiere reforzar su actividad invirtiendo el préstamo en variedad de golosinas. El principal deseo de Doña Luz Mery es que sus hijos sigan estudiando, es por eso que ella y su compañero trabajan arduamente. También cuenta con otra actividad paralela al comercio, la cual es la cría y engorde de cerdos. Este es su sexto préstamo. Ella se organizó junto con las otras señoras buscando fines en común para el bienestar de ellas y sus familias, asi mejorar las condiciones de vida. Éstas socias van invertir su préstamo en el comercio, la agricultura de plátano y banano y la cría de pollos.
texts.en: Luz has been part of the “Banco Mujer Buscando el Triunfo (Bank of Women Looking for Success),” for a long time. Currently, she is the president of the group, which is made up of 5 members of the same community, called Chase, which is an indigenous reservation. She has the necessary experience for the different activities that they develop, which are retail and the agriculture sector. This woman is 45 years old, she is divorced from her first husband, and she has 3 children who depend on her support, 2 are in secondary school and one in primary. Currently she has a partner who supports her in her daily tasks. Her partner, because of work, finds it necessary to spend more time away from home, as he works in construction and there are seasons where he has to be in other parts of the country. This affects the economic situation of the family, as she must satisfy all the needs of her children with the income generated by her productive work. She started the sale of sodas and candy in her home, and now she wants to strengthen her occupation by investing the loan in an assortment of candy. Luz’s main wish is that her children keep studying, this is why she and her partner work so hard. She also has another occupation besides retail, with is raising and fattening pigs. This is her sixth loan. She organized with the other women, looking for common goals for the well-being of themselves and their families, and improve their life conditions. These members will invest their loan in reatail, farming bananas, and raising chickens

loans.use: to buy sodas and candy.

loans.name: Antonia Fidelina

texts.es: Antonia de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica desde hace mas de 10 años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Antonia, who is 45 years old, lives in a house that she owns with her life partner. Her occupation for more than 10 years has been making and selling tortillas. Her business is located in her home and she has many clients. With what she obtains from her sales, she is able to settle some of her household expenses. She is asking for a loan to purchase corn in quintals and lime, to be able to continue making tortillas improve her income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn in quintals and lime.

loans.name: Justine

texts.en: Justine is 50 years old and married with six children, two of whom are attending school. They are living in Kasese, Uganda. She is a teacher by profession and has been doing this kind of work since 1995. She works eight hours a day and six days a week. She intends to use the loan to pay school fees for her children. She is a hardworking and honest person who lacks enough finances due to underpayment. She has a dream of educating her children to university.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Keziya

texts.en: Keziya, who lives in Bundibugyom Uganda, is a 34-year-old married man with six children and a very hardworking woman dealing in cocoa buying and selling. She got involved in the business to earn income to meet the increasing family demands. She has a cocoa garden where she gets additional income. She is challenged by bad weather and limited capital that hinders expansion of her cocoa business. Keziya has asked for a loan to buy more cocoa seeds for drying and resale to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa seeds for drying and resale to her customers.

loans.name: Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, es una persona luchadora que pone todo de sí para poder superarse cada día.
Ella comenta que lucha para poder ser alguien en la vida, y es por ello que se esfuerza mucho.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
Carolina is studying to be an accountant, she's a hardworking person who puts everything she has into improving every day. She says that she's working so that she can be somebody, and this is why she makes such an effort.

She's requesting this loan to be able to pay her college tuition, and that way continue with her studies. She's grateful for the opportunity that she's receiving.

loans.use: To pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Monisita

texts.en: Monisita is a married woman from the town of Malabuyoc, Cebu. She has seven children, ages 1 to 18. Her husband is a laborer and does not earn much for them. She has run a sari-sari (variety store) for six years now, earning her PHP 3,500. Monisita wants to expand her business but lacks the financial resources to do so. Because of this, she joined CEVI to gain access to loan services. Monisita is asking for a loan to buy more canned goods, sugar, noodles, soap, toiletries, snack foods, feed and piglets to start a hog-raising business.  She is optimistic that this loan will allow her to improve her inventory, which attracts more buyers.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, sugar, noodles, soap, toiletries, snack foods, feed and piglets.

loans.name: Hope

texts.en:
Hope is a 36-year-old hardworking married woman with four children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She owns a boutique as her main source of income, alongside farming and milk selling, which help her pay her children's school fees. She intends to expand her business but her main challenge is inadequate capital.

Hope is requesting a loan to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spirits, water, beer and sodas to sell

loans.name: Jojina

texts.en: Jojina is a 51-year-old married mother of six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She has a cocoa garden and also buys and sells cocoa as her main business. She looks after her family using the proceeds from this business and works very hard to have her children attend school. She used the previous loan to buy more cocoa to sell and realize more income. She is requesting a loan to pay school fees for her three children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Maria Orfilia

texts.es:
Maria una señora con 53 años de edad, ante la ausencia de su esposo quien falleció hace poco y debido a que no cuenta con la ayuda de un familiar, se dedica a vender mercancía en su propia casa, lo cual le ha permitido salir adelante. 

Ella desea abrir su primer local y lograr ofrecer trabajo a las personas más necesitadas.

Solicita un préstamo con el cual ella comprara cosméticos, protectores solares y variedad de productos.

Impacta la vida de Maria con un préstamo.
texts.en:
Maria is a 53 year old woman who, in light of the absence of her recently deceased husband and the lack of family to help her, works by selling merchandise in her home. This has enabled her to pull through.

She wants to open her first establishment and offer jobs to people in need.

She's applying for a loan with which she'll buy cosmetics, sunscreens, and a variety of products.

Change Maria's life with a loan.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics, sunscreens, and a variety of products.

loans.name: Jheny Vanessa

texts.es:
Vanessa una joven de 23 años, con un hija de 3 años de edad, dedicada a la cría de ganado porcino hace varios años, experiencia adquirida por medio de su madre, trabaja 7 días a la semana entre 5 y 7 horas diarias.

Una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que quiere seguir luchando por el sueño de pagarle la educación a su hija.

Solicita un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar con el cual comprara marranas de cría, cuido y mejorara el  sitio de venta.

Usted puede ser parte de este sueño, preste a Vanessa hoy.
texts.en:
Vanessa is a young 23 year old woman with a 3 year old daughter, and she has worked in pig raising for several years now. She acquired experience in this through her mother, and she works between 5 and 7 hours a day, 7 days a week. She's a hardworking and enterprising woman who wants to continue fighting for the dream of paying for her daughter's education.

She has applied for a loan at the Interactuar Corporation with which she'll buy pigs to raise, and take care of and improve her place of sale. You can be a part of this dream, lend to Vanessa today.

loans.use: To purchase young hogs to raise and take care of and improve her place of sale.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, es hija única, a la vez que estudia también trabaja. Es una persona muy sacrificada que está poniendo lo mejor de sí para cumplir con su meta.
Liz estudia la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, y por medio de sus conocimientos quiere poder aplicarlo a su ámbito profesional.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Liz is from the city of Coronel Oviedo, she's an only child, and she's working as well as studying. She's a very selfless person who's putting the best that she has into reaching her goal. Luz is studying for a degree in agricultural engineering, and wants to be able to apply her knowledge in the professional world. She's requesting this loan so that she can invest it in the payment of her college tuition and that way continue with her studies the way she's been doing.

loans.use: To pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Jhonatan David

texts.es: Jhonatan tiene 26 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos , pretenece a la ventanilla rural Mushuc Pakari ellos se dedican a la agricultura, el se dedica a la venta de legumbres y cria animales, solicita el crédito para capital de trabajo para invertir en el negocio de las legunbres ya que el compra en Riobamba para luego vender en los mercados del sector de guaranda, su sueño es tener una tienda grande para vender legumbres y cosas de tienda, en su tiempo libre le gusta compartir con su familia.
texts.en: Jhonatan is 26 years old, he is married and has 2 children. He belongs to the communal bank Mushuc Pakari. They work in agriculture, and his occupation is the sale of legumes and breeding animals. He asks for the loan to invest in the business of legumes, as he buys them in Riobamba to later sell in the markets of the area of Guaranda. His dream is to have a big store to sell legumes and things for the store. In his free time, he likes to spend time with his family.

loans.use: to invest in the business of legumes.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Ines es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, tiene 21 años, es estudiante de la carrera de enfermería, comenta que tiene una hija por quien está luchando para poder darle una buena calidad de vida y que no le falte nada.
Está esforzándose por sus seres queridos para poder darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir estudiando de esa forma.
texts.en:
Ines is from the city of Coronel Oviedo, she's 21 years old and is studying to be a nurse. She says that she has a daughter on whose behalf she's working hard so that she can give her a good standard of living and so that she doesn't lack for anything.

She's trying hard for the sake of her loved ones so that she can give them everything that she wasn't able to have. She has requested this loan to be able to pay her college tuition and that way continue with her studies.

loans.use: To pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en:
Fred of Kamwenge, Uganda used his previous loan to buy more crates of sodas and beer, and cartons of water to sell.

He still operates a depot shop, alongside brick-making and farming, which has helped him earn a living and educate his children. He faces challenges of the high rate of defaulters, price fluctuations and high transport costs. However, he hopes to buy a vehicle, expand his business, become a known businessman, and have all his children educated.

He is requesting a loan to buy more crates of sodas and beer and cartons of water to sell.

loans.use: to buy more crates of sodas and beer and cartons of water.

loans.name: Ivonne Milagros

texts.es: Ivonne de 36 años se incorporó a la vida comercial con la finalidad de generar recursos adicionales para su familia, ella labora en una empresa y su actividad comercial se combina perfectamente con su trabajo, puesto que sus clientes potenciales son sus compañeros de trabajo a quienes ofrece productos de tocador y de aseo mediante la promoción directa a través de catálogos,  así mismo su clientela también se constituye por vecinos, amigos, familiares.  Como su capital de trabajo es insuficiente para responder a la demanda de sus clientes, decidió realizar una solicitud de crédito y  está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para invertir en perfumes, ropa y artículos de tocador.  Con esta inversión planea un incremento en sus ventas que le generen mejores ganancias las cuales piensa capitalizar con el fin de cumplir con sueño de organizar su propio almacén y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ivonne, 36 years old, joined the business world with the goal of generating additional income for her family. She works in a company and her business blends seamlessly with her work since her potential customers are her coworkers to whom she offers cosmetic products and toiletries through direct promotion via catalogs. Her clientele also consist of neighbors, friends, and family members. 
Since her working capital is inadequate to meet the demands of her customers, she decided to complete a credit application and is applying for a credikiva, the first financing that the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo is making devoted to perfumes, clothing, and cosmetics. With this investment, she anticipates an increase in sales that generate higher profits which she intends to capitalize on in order to fulfill her dream of setting up her own department store and improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: invest in perfumes, clothing, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Oliver

texts.en: Oliver is 23 years old, married with three children, two of whom go to school and living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She is a retailer and she has been in that business for five years to earn a living. She grows and sell cocoa to supplement the income from her general store shop. She dreams of expanding her business, however is limited by inadequate capital. Oliver has asked for a loan to re-stock her shop items like beer, salt and others to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to re-stock her shop items like beer, salt and others to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 59-year-old hardworking married woman with nine children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She also cares for a herdsman. She practices the rearing of cattle alongside agriculture where she especially sells bananas and coffee to get extra income. She loves to be self-reliant and expand her farm into a modern one; however, her main challenge is rampant diseases that attack her animals.

She is requesting a loan to buy more cattle for her farm.

loans.use: to buy more cattle for her farm.

loans.name: Dife

texts.en: Dife, a villager and a mother of two, 27 and 21. She wants this loan for her youngest one, Naim’s surgery, who is seen in the picture and whose surgery has been scheduled already. He had an accident while working with an agricultural tractor and one of his legs suffered a severe injury. With them there is a little baby in a cradle as well, Dife’s grandson. Kindly note that cradles are still in use in rural areas of Albania, especially in the northern part where cradle is considered traditional. Dife has been doing agriculture for a living; she has 70 olive groves and sells 100 kg olives, 500 kg green peppers and 400 kg tomatoes a year. In addition to this little income, her husband works for $250/month.

loans.use: to pay for a scheduled surgery of her son whose leg was injured in an accident.

loans.name: Kamini Group

texts.en:
In the year 2015, five independent women in Khandagiri, Bhubaneswar of the Khurda district, Odisha, India formed a group named Kamini. The main objective was to get economic security through expansion of their existing business and development of their social livelihood by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. Jayanti is the most active and energetic lady of the concerned village and has taken a decision to improve herself. The outstanding lady’s age is about 46 years old and she is standing first on the left-hand side of the photo with her hand raised. She is a cheerful lady with a high ambition. Her family consists of her husband and two children.

For 12 years, Jayanti is engaged in a dairy farm with the help and support of her family. She earns a monthly income of Rs 10,000 from her occupation. But the present income is not sufficient to manage the business expenses as well as the household expenses for her family. So she decided to raise her income by increasing the volume of her business with debt in the form of a loan. She has also taken the same loan amount from Mahashakti Foundation and will purchase another 1/2 hybrid cow from the nearest wholesale market. Through this, she hopes that she will definitely generate a handsome amount of extra income. She has a dream of saving enough for the better education of her children and construction of a good house. 

The other four members of the group are also engaged with different small businesses like a furniture shop, vegetable vending, tailoring, milk selling, etc. They also can develop themselves through post loan disbursement.

loans.use: to purchase another one or two hybrid cows

loans.name: Bina Group

texts.en:
Bina Group started in the year 2015 at Siripur, Bhubaneswar  of Khurda district, Odisha, India. There are five active self-dependent women, with an objective for developing their businesses as well as their livelihood. All the members of concerned group have their own profession and business. Ritarani is one of them who taken a great role for her development and their group members’ employment improvement. She is standing in front of the group at extreme left in the photo. She is about 34 years old and living with her small family, her husband and two children. 
She has been engaged with soft drink business in her own home of Siripur village since 5 years. Her husband is also helping her to support the business. Through concerned business she earns a monthly income of 6,500 INR. Her opinion is that, from this small income it is very difficult to maintain her family in this urban area city like Bhubaneswar. After that to get sufficient surplus to reinvest in the business is practically impossible. So she formed a group for strengthening social relations and to avail loan for the expansion of her business.
Ritanjali planned to purchase some branded soft drinks to sale as per demand of the customer from nearest market. She hopes to get more and more profit from her business expansion and save money for rebuilt of another shop and to provide better education to her children.

The other 04 members of the group are also smart at their professional and also actively engaged with different professional like beauty parlor, vegetable vending, electronic shop, fast food shop and hope to make better their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase some branded soft drinks

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La Señora Norma esta casa y tiene hijos por quien está luchando para poder ser alguien en la vida, y ser una buena profesional.
Está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, y por medio de sus estudios quiere abrirse camino para ayudar a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir su gasto de titulación y de esa forma poder seguir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Señora Norma is married and has children. She is fighting to make something of herself and become a professional for her family.

She is studying to be a nurse, and she wants to use her education to help others. She is requesting a loan to cover the cost of her degree. With this, she will be able to go forward with her goals.

loans.use: to cover the costs of higher education

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es:
Fátima vive en el Chaco, tiene un hermano pequeño, viene de una familia que lucha y se esfuerza por poder salir adelante e ir mejorando.
Fatima está estudiando la carrera de comercio internacional, y por medio de su carrera quiere abrirse camino para dar a sus seres queridos una mejor vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Fátima lives in the Chaco and has a younger brother. She comes from a family that fights and works hard to get ahead and improve. Fátima is studying International Trade and would like to become a professional and provide her loved ones with a better life. 

She is requesting a loan to cover tuition expenses and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay tuition expenses.

loans.name: Luz Diney

texts.es:
Luz una joven con 25 años de edad, separada y con un hijo de 2 años, dedicada al trabajo de  la cría de aves, lo cual lo aprendió viendo a su madre, y por el medio que hoy día ha logrado salir adelante.

Su sueño es tener una vivienda propia y así brindarle u mejor futuro a su hijo.

Con el préstamo solicitado comprara pollos mallas y bultos de cuido, así sus ventas mejoraran.

Su préstamo ayudara a Luz a invertir en un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Luz is a 25-year old woman who has a 2-year old son and is separated. She works breeding birds, something that she learned from her mother and that lets her get ahead today. Her dream is to have her own house and to provide her son with a better future. 

She plans to use the loan to buy nets and food for the chicken, so that her sales will improve. The loan will help Luz to invest in a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy nets and food for the chicken, so that her sales will improve.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
La Sra. Mirna tiene 50 años, está acompañada hace más de 20, tiene dos  hijos ya mayores que con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio pudo sacar adelante.
Ella desde temprana edad empezó a trabajar como empleada domestica, y en sus días libres se dedicaba a tejer y a confeccionar las colchas artesanales. Hoy en día ella continua con sus confecciones y ella misma lleva a  vender sus productos en la zona de la capital con la ayuda de su marido.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas, fajas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mirna is 50 years old and has had a partner for over 20 years. They have 2 adult children that she was able to support with hard work and sacrifice. She started to work as a maid when she was very young and used to knit and make quilts in her free time.
