Today she keeps knitting and selling her products in the capital area with the help of her husband. 

She is requesting a loan to buy hammocks, blankets, corsets and sheets, as she has many orders for these products.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, corsets and sheets.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
La Sra. Aurelia tiene 64 años, vive en la ciudad de Caacupé, ella comenta que tiene una despensa y librería en su casa, que pudo montar con mucho sacrificio, la ayuda su hija en la atención del negocio.
Aurelia es una persona muy trabajadora que pese a los problemas e inconvenientes lucha por poder salir adelante. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de arroz en cantidad a buen precio para fraccionar y vender en su despensa, así tendrá suficiente productos para la ventas y  satisfacer a su clientela. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Aurelia is 64 years old and lives in the city of Caacupé. She runs a grocery and bookstore in her house, which she was able to start with a lot of sacrifice. She counts on her daughter's help to run the business. Aurelia is very hardworking and fights to get ahead despite all the problems and inconveniences. 

She is requesting a loan to buy rice in bulk at good price, so that she can divide it and sell it at the store to meet her clients' demand. She is grateful for the opportunity that she had to keep running her business.

loans.use: to buy rice in bulk to then divide it and sell it, as well as other products to sell in the store.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
El Sr. Alfredo tiene 55 años, comenta que se inició siendo muy joven como acompañante de choferes en camiones, después ya empezó a trabajar como chofer, luego de mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro comprar un camión para poder hacer fletes.
Gracias a dicha actividad puede llevar una vida digna y mantenerle a su familia .Comenta siempre tiene trabajos por realizar.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de cubiertas para su camión y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Mr. Alfredo is 55 years old and started to help drivers in trucks when he was very young. He later started to work as a driver himself and, after a lot of dedication and hard work, was able to buy a truck for transportation. Thanks to his job, he can have a decent life and support his family. He always has trips to do. 

He is requesting a loan to buy covers for his truck, so that he can keep doing his job.

loans.use: to buy covers for his truck.

loans.name: Ana Delia

texts.es:
Delia una señora de 50 años, con tres hijos mayores, trabajadora y emprendedora, debido a que su estabilidad económica no es la mejor, se dedica a vender comida desde su propia casa, de esta manera logra cubrir la necesidades básicas de su hogar.
 
Su sueño es pagarles la educación a sus hijos, ya que estos desean continuar sus estudios y mejorar las condiciones en que se encuentra su vivienda.

Con el préstamo solicitado en Corporación Interactuar ella comprara cilindro de gas, mesa de madera y sillas plásticas, con esto lograra mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes e incrementar sus ganancias.

Su préstamo ayudara a Delia invertir en un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en: Delia is a 50 year old woman with three adult children. She is hardworking and enterprising. Given that her financial stability is not the best, she works selling food from her own house. This way she is able to pay for the basic needs of her household. Her dream is to be able to pay for her children's education, because they wish to continue with their studies and improve the condition of their house. With the loan requested to Corporación Interactuar, she will buy a gas cylinder, a wooden table and plastic chairs. With this she will be able to improve her sales, increase her customers and her earnings. Your loan will help Delia invest in a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy a gas cylinder, a wooden table and plastic chairs.

loans.name: Otilio Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael un hombre de 52 años de edad, soltero, trabajador y emprendedor, debido a que no cuenta con una ayuda de la familia y desde hace poco que se encuentra desempleado, monto su negocio de comidas rápidas con el cual logra cubrir sus necesidades básicas.

Su sueño es ahorrar dinero de su trabajo y comprar una vivienda propia.

Rafael solicito un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar con el cual comprara la carpa para su carro de perros.

Con su ahorro Rafael podrá continuar su sueño.
texts.en:
Rafael is a 52-year old single man and a hardworking entrepreneur. After becoming unemployed and not counting on the help of his family, he decided to start his own fast food business, which allows him to cover basic needs. His dream is to save money to buy a house. 

He is requesting a loan to Corporación Interactuar to buy a canopy for his dog carriage. Thanks to his savings, Rafael will be able to reach his dream.

loans.use: to buy a canopy for his dog carriage.

loans.name: Raul Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago un hombre de 23 años, soltero y sin hijos, con un espíritu emprendedor, dedicado a vender mercancía en la Ceja.

Su sueño es formalizar su propio negocio, y en caso de tener hijos dejárselos a ellos.

Solicito un préstamo con el cual el comprara productos de belleza, nutrición, hogar, cuidado personal, entre otros. Lo cual le permitirá mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes y generar más ingresos.

Su préstamo ayudara a invertir en un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Santiago is a 23 year old man. He is single and has no children. With an enterprising spirit, he works selling merchandise in La Ceja. His dream is to formalize his own business, and in case of having children, to leave it to them. He requested a loan to buy beauty, nutrition and personal care products, among other things. This will allow him to improve his sales, increase his customers and generate more income. Your loan will help him invest in a better future.

loans.use: to buy beauty, nutrition and personal care products, among other things.

loans.name: Hector Dario

texts.es:
Héctor un hombre con 55 años de edad, casado, trabajador y responsable, actualmente laborando en un parqueadero, lo que le ha permitido un gran progreso.

Su sueño es generar más ingresos y darle a su familia lo que necesiten.

Héctor solicito un préstamo en la Corporación interactuar con el fin de ajustar para comprar lava tapetes y maquinas. Lo cual le ayudara a aumentar sus clientes y generar mejores ingresos.

Con su apoyo este sueño podrá continuar.
texts.en:
Hector, 55, is a hard-working, responsible, married man who currently works at a carpark which has allowed him to make progress.  His dream is to earn more income and give his family all they need.

Hector is requesting a loan through Corporacion Interactuar to buy carpet washing equipment and other machines.  This will enable him to attract more customers and generate more income.

With your support he can continue to follow his dream.

loans.use: To buy carpet washing equipment and machines.

loans.name: Maria Laura

texts.es: Maria tiene 28 años de edad es soltera y tiene un hijo de 3 años vive en Guaranda provincia de Bolivar , pertenece a la ventanilla Mushuc Pakari, Ella se dedica la a agricultura y solicita el credito para la compra de una vaca para mejorar su ganado e insumos para su sembrios, realizara las compras en Riobamba, su sueño es tener mas ganado y en su tiempo libre se dedica a su hijo.
texts.en:
Maria, 28, is single and has a three-year-old son.  She lives in Guaranda in the province of Bolivar which belongs to the Mushuc Pakari canton.  She works in agriculture and is requesting a loan to buy a cow to improve her livestock and supplies for her crops.  She does her shopping in Riobamba.

Her dream is to have more livestock.  She spends her free time with her son.

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Juan Gerardo

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre emprendedor que trabajó durante años en diferentes empresas, pero hace un tiempo decidió iniciar un pequeño negocio. 

El trabaja en la venta de mercancía todos los días durante unas 6 horas.

Juan utilizará el crédito solicitado a la Corporación Interactuar para comprar al por mayor surtido de ropa para dama, calzado, accesorios, entre otros, con el objetivo de aumentar su inventario y mejorar su capital de trabajo.

Es un hombre con gran capacidad de trabajo y actitud positiva.

El sueña con acreditar el negocio y con poder incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Juan is an enterprising man who worked for years at different companies, but just recently decided to open a small business. He works some six hours every day selling merchandise. Juan will use the requested loan to Corporación Interactuar to buy an assortment of women's clothes, footwear and accessories, among others, at wholesale prices in order to increase his stock and improve his work capital. He is a man with great work ability and positive attitude. He dreams of asserting his business and with it to be able to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of women's clothes, footwear and accessories, among other things, at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Rosa Andrea

texts.es: Rosa esta en sus 34 años de edad, ella esa madre soltera que para sacar adelante a su hijo trabaja al jornal y también siembra  pequeños huertos de alverja y de otros productos, Rosa vive en el campo y comenta que los ingresos económicos los obtiene de la agricultura, por este motivo solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlos en la compra de abono y fungicidas para tener sanos a sus cultivos, la aspiración de Rosa es seguir en su negocio para tener buenas cosechas y lograr mejores ganancias, todo lo hace para el bienestar de su hija que tiene 4 años y ya asiste a la escuela.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 34-year old single mother who works as a farmer and sows small patches of peas and other products to support her son. She lives in the countryside and says that her income comes from agriculture. 

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and fungicide to keep her crops healthy. Her goal is to keep running her business, to have good harvests and to increase her income, so that she can provide her 4-year old daughter already in school with the best.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicide.

loans.name: Jeovanny Alberto

texts.es:
Jeovany es muy querido en su comunidad. Hace 14 años Jeovany buscó la independencia financiera y abrió su propio taller de confección. 

Su red de amigos, familiares y vecinos le apoyó con gran afecto y lealtad a lo largo de todo el proceso de iniciar un negocio. 

El está buscando un préstamo para comprar tela, hilos, botones, apliques, y otros suministros que incrementarán la capacidad de su taller. 

Está cumpliendo su sueño, el de levantarse cada día con la energía y la satisfacción de servir a sus clientes. 

Ayuda Jeovany seguir viviendo el sueño!
texts.en:
Jeovanny is very appreciated in his community. He decided to have financial independence opening his own dressmaking studio 14 years ago. His network of friends, family and neighbors supported him with fondness and loyalty during the whole process. 

He is requesting a loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, appliqués and other products that will improve his business. He is reaching his dream waking up every morning with the energy and motivation to serve his clients. 

Help Jeovanny to keep making his dream a reality!

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, appliqués and other products that will improve his business.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar un hombre con 46 años de edad, separado y sin hijos, dedicado a realizar trabajos de construcción hace ya tiempos  y por el medio en el cual ha logrado salir adelante.

Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda ya que con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando.

Edgar solicitud un préstamo con el cual comprara una pulidora, taladro, cortador de baldosa, entre otras herramientas, lo cual le ayudar a generar más ingresos.

Aporte al sueño de Edgar y haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Edgar, 46, is divorced and has no children.  He has been working in construction for quite some time and has been able to earn a living this way.

His goal is to renovate his home since it has deteriorated over time.  He is requesting a loan to buy a polishing machine, drill, tile cutter and other tools so he can earn more income.

Please support Edgar's dream by making a loan.

loans.use: To buy a polishing machine, drill, tile cutter and other tools.

loans.name: Amparo Alexandra

texts.es: Amparo tiene 32 años de edad, ella es madre soltera, su hija tiene  2 años, Amparo vive en el campo y su actividad principal es la de sembrar pequeños huertos de alverja, frejol, habas y otros productos que se dan por su localidad, Amparo necesita el dinero del crédito para comprar abono y fungicidas para tener sus cultivos sanos y den buena producción, Amparo comenta que todo su esfuerzo y su trabajo lo realiza para el bienestar de su hijo y para que no le haga falta lo mas necesario.
texts.en:
Amparo is a 32-year old single mother who has a 2-year old daughter. Amparo lives in the countryside and her main activity is to sow small patches of peas, beans and other products of her locality. 

Amparo needs the loan to buy fertilizer and fungicide to keep the crops healthy and obtain good harvest. Amparo says that everything she does is for the well being of her daughter, so that she does not lack any basic need.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicide.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Isabel  pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES UNIDAS, la socia continua dedicándose  al negocio de transporte, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando en su negocio para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Isabel is a member of the communal bank "Mujeres Unidas". She has worked in the transportation business for a long time and has been successful thanks to her dedication to the job every day. Her goal is to keep working so that she can support her family. 

The member is requesting a loan to cover the maintenance of her vehicle. She is grateful to lenders and commits to repay as scheduled.

loans.use: to cover the maintenance of her vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay workers to harvest maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Ángel Humberto

texts.es:
Angel, a sus 53 años de edad, es un hombre carismático y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

A pesar de las adversidades, el tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 2 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.

Trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas con 1 empleado

Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de sus ventas.

Angel manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo su negocio con la ayuda de Interactuar y en un futuro desea convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten. 

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de Colombia!
texts.en:
Angel, 53, is a charismatic, service-oriented man who is dedicated to his business.  He has a grocery store that he started out of necessity to earn an income to support his family.

Despite adversities, he has found the strength and determination to pick himself up and carry on, having been in business for two years now.  He works every day, ten hours a day, with an employee.

His purpose in life is to continue his progress and strengthen his business by investing in a variety of products such as groceries, grains, fritters, sodas and basic stable goods.  This will enable him to provide better customer service and achieve a significant increase in sales and income.

Angel says his greatest goal is to continue expanding his business, with help from Interactuar, until one day it becomes a supermarket where customers can find anything they need.

By supporting this loan you are contributing to entrepreneurship in Colombia!

loans.use: To buy a variety of groceries, grains, fritters, sodas and general staple goods.

loans.name: Arley

texts.es:
Desde el año 2012 la señora Arley encontró la fórmula para sentirse útil y poder generar sus propios ingresos y lo logro gracias a la venta de mercancía.

Arley es una responsable, trabajadora y servicial mujer de 32 años de edad que se enorgullece de lo que ha logrado pues ella misma consigue su sustento y el de sus 3 hijos. 

Solicita un crédito para comprar sombreros, ponchos, accesorios, entre otros al por mayor y así poder aumentar sus ventas. 

Este es un negocio poco común en su barrio y es por eso que le dedica de 16 horas a su negocio.

Con tu ayuda Arley podrá mejorar su capital y tener un mejor sustento, apoya hoy!
texts.en:
In 2012 Arley found the way to feel useful and generate her own income thanks to merchandise sales.  She is a responsible, hard-working, service-oriented woman, age 32, who is proud of her achievements and the fact that she supports herself and three children.

She is requesting a loan to buy hats, ponchos, accessories, and other items, wholesale, to increase sales.  Her business is not very common in her neighborhood so she works 16 hours a day.

With your help, Arley will improve her capital and have better support.  Please contribute today!

loans.use: To buy hats, ponchos, accessories and other items, wholesale, so she can increase sales.

loans.name: Benkan-Ton Group

texts.fr:
SEYDOU est le monsieur qui a le mouton à la main sur la photo.
SEYDOU est un malien âgé de 41 ans non scolarisé
Il est marié père de 07 enfants, 01 garçon et 06 filles. Les enfants sont âgés de 4 à 15 ans et ne fréquentent pas l’école. Sa femme est ménagère. SEYDOU fait recourt au RMCR pour pouvoir bien mener son activité, il fait l’élevage des ovins. Il mène cette activité depuis très longtemps. Cette activité lui plait beaucoup car c’est avantageux. Il s’approvisionne sur les marchés environnants et revend dans les mêmes marchés.  Le profit qu’il gagne lui permettra de prendre en charge certaines dépenses de sa famille. Il rencontre souvent des problèmes de mévente sur le marché. 
Dans l’avenir, il veut tirer beaucoup de profit.
texts.en:
Seydou is the man with his hand on the sheep in the photograph. He's 41 years old, a Malian, and didn't go to school.

He is the father of seven children, one boy and six girls, aged 4 to 15. They don't go to school. His wife is a housewife.

Seydou is seeking help from Kiva's partner, RMCR, in order to carry out his business: raising sheep. He's been running this business for a long time.

He likes this business very much because it is quite profitable. He gets his supplies from the surrounding markets, where he also resells.

The profit he will make will enable him to cover some of his family's expenses. He often experiences slow sales in the market.

In the future, he wants to make important profits.

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell

loans.name: Luz Carlota

texts.es:
La socia Luz Carlota pertenece al banco comunal MUJRES UNIDAS, la socia  continua con su negocio  de venta de ropa, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando en su negocio para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de casacas entre otros  para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Luz Carlota belongs to the MUJERES UNIDAS communal bank. She is continuing with her business selling clothing. She has been running this business for some time and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts into her business every day. Luz Carlota  wants to be able to continue working in her business so she can continue to support her family in this way.

She is asking for the loan to buy jackets and other items for her business. She is grateful for the loan and promises to meet her agreed repayments.

loans.use: to buy jackets and other items for her business.

loans.name: Wilson Leonpio

texts.es: Wilson esta casado, tiene 53 años de edad, su esposa se dedica a la crianza de animales, Wilson tiene una hija de 18 años y un hijo de 10 años de edad, Wilson se dedica a trabajar en el campo, siembra papas, maíz, cebolla y otros productos que  son propios del lugar donde reside, Wilson a veces trabaja de jornalero, Wilson solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo comprando  fungicidas para fumigar sus sembríos, Wilson trabaja y se esfuerza por incrementar sus sembríos para que sus cosechas le dejen buena rentabilidad y así cubrir los gastos de educación, alimentación y demás necesidades de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Wilson, 53 years old, is married and he has an 18-year-old daughter and a 10-year-old son. His wife works raising animals. He works planting potatoes, corn, onions, and other produce that grows locally on the land. At times, Wilson also works as a day laborer.

Wilson is applying for this loan to invest in fungicides in order to maintain his crops. He works and makes efforts to boost the crop yields, looking to  get good profits from the harvests. He can thereby cover the expenses in raising his children, including school fees, food and other needs.

loans.use: to buy compost and fungicides.

loans.name: Ama

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 37 ans, Ama est une femme mère de cinq enfants. Ama habite à Baguida et vend des chaussures en se promenant dans le quartier afin d’avoir le bénéfice nécessaire pour leur épanouissement. Pour arriver à ses fins, Ama s’approvisionne six fois par mois au marché local de Lomé. Pour commander des chaussures, Ama demande ce prêt pour réaliser son achat et disposer d’un revenu afin d’aider son mari dans l’éducation de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Ama, age 27, is married and the mother of five children. She lives in Baguida and sells shoes in her neighborhood as a traveling saleswoman, in order to provide for her children and ensure their blossoming.

To meet this goal, Ama gets supplies from the local market in Lomé, six times per month. Ama is seeking this loan in order to order shoes and pay for them. She will thus earn an income and be able to help her husband cover their children's school expenses.

loans.use: to buy 40 pairs of shoes

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
La socia Nieves pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES UNIDAS, la socia sigue dedicándose a la  venta de comida, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando en su negocio para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia requiere el préstamo para comprar arroz, aceite, entre otros.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member, Nieves, belongs to the Mujeres Unidas communal bank group. She continues to work selling food, the member has been working at this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business each day. The member wants to be able to continue working in her business so, in this way, to continue supporting her family.

The member needs the loan to purchase rice, oil, and more.

The member is grateful for and values the granted loan, through this platform, and in the same way promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, and more.

loans.name: Luz Eli

texts.es:
La socia Luz Eli pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Unidas”, la socia continua con el negocio de llamadas telefónicas como locales y nacionales, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua realizando las llamadas nacionales y locales a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para renovar sus equipos.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member, Luz Eli, belongs to the Mujeres Unidas communal bank. The member continues with her business of local and national telephone calls. The member is a responsible and determined person. She continues making national and local calls for all the customers who ask for them, and in this way the member gets her family ahead.

The member asks for the loan to update her equipment.

The member is grateful for, and values, the loan granted through this platform and at the same time promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to update her equipment.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DEL CARMEN, él banco esta ubicado en la provincia de La Convencion, distrito de Maranura y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Vicentina tiene 47 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 04 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al cultivo de frutas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma segur apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de semillas y abono.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Virgen Del Carmen communal bank. The bank is located in the province of La Convencion, Maranura district and Cusco department.

The member, Vicentina, is 47 years old, partnered, and has 4 children. The member alternates her daily tasks with growing fruits. The member has had her business for a good while, which is going well for her due to the determination she puts into her business each day. The member wants to continue working so, in this way, to continue supporting her family. 

The member asks for the loan to purchase seeds and manure.

The members are grateful for the granted loan and promise to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and manure.

loans.name: Santos Samuel

texts.es: Santos tiene 41 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su madre y su hijo de 12 años quien anteriormente vivía con su madre. Santos es un hombre muy trabajador quien se gana la vida como jornalero desde hace mucho tiempo trabajando en la siembra de maíz y frijol, además para obtener mejores ingresos económicos se dedica a la venta de animales de corral. Santos anteriormente obtuvo un crédito para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio pero debido a que las lluvia el año pasado fueron abundantes se vio en la necesidad de redireccionar el dinero del crédito para la compra de lámina, polines y madera para la construcción de una galera que era necesaria para proteger a sus animales de las incesantes lluvias, debido a la buena experiencia que tuvo y con el deseo de hacer realidad su gran objetivo de construir un cuarto dormitorio Santos vuelve a recurrir y solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI  para comprar materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, lamina, etc., para la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio que pueda darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Santos is 41 years old, lives in his own house with his mother and his 12-year-old child who previously lived with his mother. Santos is a very hard-working man who has earned his living as a day laborer for a long time growing corn and beans. In addition, to get more income, he works selling small animals. Before, Santos got a loan to invest in the construction of a bedroom, but due to the abundant rain last year, he had to use the money from the loan to purchase metal sheeting, beams, and wood to build a shed that was necessary to protect his animals from the incessant rain. Due to the good experience that he had, and with the desire to make his big goal of building a bedroom a reality, Santos is back, asking for another loan from FUSAI to purchase materials such as bricks, cement, sand, metal, metal sheeting, etc. to build a bedroom that can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as bricks, cement, sand, metal, metal sheets, etc. to build a bedroom that can give his family a better quality of life.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia Felicitas pertenece al banco comunal MUJERES UNIDAS, la socia sigue dedicándose a su negocio de venta de fruta, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando en su negocio para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de naranjas, manzanas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member, Felicitas, belongs to the Mujeres Unidas communal bank group. The member continues to work at her business selling fruit. The member has been working at this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business each day. The member wants to be able to continue working in her business so, in this way, to continue supporting her family.

The member asks for the loan to purchase oranges, apples, and more.

The member is grateful for the loan and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase oranges, apples, and more.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal  “MUJERES UNIDAS” y el banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián de la provincia de Cusco y del departamento de Cusco.
La socia continua dedicándose a la atención de turistas en el alquiler de cuartos, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando en su negocio para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas entre otros.
La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member continues to belong to the Mujeres Unidas communal bank group and the communal bank is located in San Sebastian district, in Cusco province and Cusco department.

The member continues working serving tourists by renting out rooms. The member has been working at this business for a good while, which is going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business each day. The member wants to be able to continue working in her business so, in this way, to continue supporting her family.

The member asks for the loan to purchase sheets, and more.

The member is grateful for, and values, the loan granted through this platform and at the same time, promises to make her payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase sheets and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Sanchita

texts.en:
Sanchita is a rural hardworking woman of 27 years. She is married to Jayanta, a 32-year-old farmer. They live in Raychenga, a small village in Alipurduar district, West Bengal, India. 

Sanchita’s husband is a very hardworking man. He cultivates on his ancestral land. He mainly grows paddy rice. His business goes well because he has a lot of knowledge about its production and always offers quality products. He supplies his rice to the rice dealers in the nearby market. 

In order to strengthen the business and respond to client demand, Sanchita is requesting a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) for purchasing fertilizers, pesticides, seeds, and to cover the operational costs. Their goal is to increase their business activity.

Sanchita is very thankful for Kiva and BJS. With this investment, they will be able to have a better production, and with his earnings, they can improve their family’s quality of life.

In the future they want to purchase a tractor with the profit of their business for the ease of their cultivation works.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural inputs for growing paddy rice.

loans.name: Rahija

texts.en:
Rahija is a 38-year-old rural housewife. She lives in a remote village of Alipurduar with her husband and three children (two sons and a daughter). One of her sons is studying in higher secondary grade and one does some small electric work in his neighborhood. Her daughter has got married. 

As all of them have grown up, Rahija gets lot of time to spend in her own grocery store. She completed secondary education but the poor economic resources of her parents did not provide her with further education. 

Rahija's husband is a driver whose income is very inconsistent. To support her husband Rahija started her grocery business and contributes a lion’s share in her family. At present, she sells daily necessities like sugar, rice, flour, biscuits, bread, eggs, etc., and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of her good fortune and so likes to stock her shop with more varieties of items to extend better service to her daily customers as well as to strengthen the family economy.

So Rahija applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to restock the store with more grocery items to fulfill the customers' demands so that she will retain and encourage more customers. She hopes the loan will generate more income and with the profit she will be able to expand her business. She wants to make her dreams come true.

She gives thanks to her generous lenders for the financial assistance.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of grocery items for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Jerlyn

texts.es: Jerlyn, tiene la edad  de 34 años, está casada,  vive con su esposo  y su hijo, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de equipo que le de al cliente una mejor comunidad al momento de realizarle los tratamientos y materiales requeridos para realizar trabajos de belleza y así poder ofrecer una mayor variedad de estilos de corte de cabello y tratamientos de uñas y tintes para el cabello y otros servicios adicionales y con productos y técnicas de alta calidad y seguridad, y de esta manera poderle ofreces a los clientes una mayor cantidad de productos para el uso humano y todos con garantía. Con esta compra pretende tener mejores ingresos para invertir más en su negocio y cumplir algunas metas que en el futuro le mejorará su calidad de vida para ella y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jerlyn is 34 years old, married, and lives with her husband and her child, who are her greatest priority. With the loan, she plans to purchase the equipment that gives the customer a better community when doing the treatments, and the required materials to do the beauty treatments and, so, to be able to offer a better variety of haircut styles and nail treatments, and hair coloring and other additional services and with high-quality and safe products and techniques, and in this way be abler to offer her clients a better quantity of products for human use and all with a guarantee. With this, she plans to have more income to invest more in her business and meet some goals that in the future will improve the quality of life for her and her family. This is the first loan that she is getting from FUDECOSUR. She has never had other loans before in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and materials for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es: Teresa, tiene la edad  de 56 años, está en unión libre, vive con su esposo. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos pollos para el engorde y algunas gallinas ponedoras pero que estén comenzando a poner para que tengan el mayor periodo poniendo. La idea es aprovechar  las buenas condiciones del lugar donde viva para el desarrollo de la actividad además de poder vender los animales una vez gordos y los huevos a los miembros de la comunidad y así no invertir en transporte y poder comercializar los productos más frescos debido a la cercanía de los consumidores.  Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en el negocio.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Teresa is 56 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and lives with her husband. With her loan, she plans to purchase some chickens to fatten and some laying hens which are just beginning to lay, so that they have a longer laying period. The idea is to take advantage of the good conditions of the place where she lives to develop this activity. In addition, she will be able to sell the animals once they are fattened and the eggs to the members of the community and in this way not pay for transportation and to be able to sell the products fresher due to the proximity of the consumers. With this purchase, she will be able to develop an additional activity, and at the same time have savings that will allow her to have more animals and invest more in her business. It is the first loan that she is getting from FUDECOSUR. She has never had other loans before at state banks, but FUDECOSUR offers her the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase chickens to fatten and laying hens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Oscar Andrey

texts.es: Oscar Andrey, tiene la edad  de 23 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos,  los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de frijol de buena calidad y que tenga una buena germinación y de fertilizantes orgánicos que le ayuden a mejorar las condiciones del suelo y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno y de labores que le ayuden a que el agua de lluvia no cause daños por la erosión, y también para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Oscar Andrey is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents and siblings, who are his greatest priority. With the loan, he plans to purchase good-quality bean seeds and to have good germination and organic fertilizers that help him to improve the condition of the soil and other products to use on the crops. In addition, he will pay labor costs for the work preparing the land and the work that helps the rain water not to cause damage by erosion, and also to apply the products and support the plants once they are developed and, in this way, assure himself of doing good work. What he plans is to take advantage of the good climatic and soil conditions that are in the zone for this crop, and also to put into practice the various years of experience growing basic grains. In addition to being able to purchase the best products and of the best quality so that his crops develop well and healthily and also to have a good harvest and have, in the short term, a significant production. With the income from the harvest that he hopes to get, he wants to use it for his family's well-being and education and to meet some family goals and continue investing more in his crops. It is the first loan that he is getting from FUDECOSUR. He has never had other loans before with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality bean seeds and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Runa

texts.en:
Runa is a resident of Muniguda village of Rayagada district, Odisha, India. She is 33 years old. She has a small family with her husband and children. 

She and her husband are engaged with the occupations of tailoring and welding at her own home village. She has everything as per requirement of basic necessities of life: a good shop with permanent income and other allied items to manage her family. Still, her family members are not happy due to the inavailability of a good RCC (reinforced cement concrete) owned house.

They are staying at their own house but it is roofed with asbestos. The current house is made from lower standard brick and roofed with asbestos, which creates a very critical situation during rainy season. It is also very difficult to stay during winter period. The most important thing is the house is not completely secure and safe. 

In this situation, she decided to re-construct an RCC house with all possible facilities. She has already started to construct the house. But she is not having sufficient funds to complete it. So she decided to borrow loan from any bank or other financial institution.

At this moment, Runa came to Mahashakti Foundation to know about house loan details. Mahashakti Foundation has decided to disburse a loan for house construction. From the loan, Runa will complete the flooring and coloring of the house. She will also complete the wiring with electricity connection.

She is very happy to know that her house will be complete within a few months. It not only reduces the financial burden but also help Runa to feel proud to have an owned house in the society.

loans.use: to complete the door, windows, plastering, flooring and coloring of the house.

loans.name: Carina Vanessa

texts.es: Carina es una joven de 25 años de edad, ella esta  casada y tiene una hija de 9 años de edad, Carina se dedica a crianza de animales menores, el esposo de Carina trabaja de albañil o de jornalero, Carina solicita el dinero del crédito para comprar pollos, ya que comenta que su madre le presta un lugar donde criar sus pollitos o también los tiene en la terraza de la casa donde vive arrendando, Carina es una madre muy  amorosa con su hija y esta orgullosa de que su hija asista a la escuela y es muy estudiosa y Carina espera que le siga yendo bien en su negocio y que le alcance para pagar los estudios de su hija.
texts.en: Carina is a young woman, 25 years old, married, and has a 9-year-old daughter. Carina works raising small animals. Carina's husband works as a bricklayer or a day laborer. Carina asks for the money from the loan to purchase chickens, and says that her mother lent her a place to raise the chicks and also that she has them in the terrace of the house where they are renting. Carina is a very loving mother to her daughter and is proud that her daughter goes to school and is very studious and Carina hopes that she continues doing well in her business and that it is enough to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Santilata

texts.en:
Santilata is a resident of Muniguda village of Rayagada district, Odisha, India. She is 45 years old. She has a small family with her husband and one son and one daughter. 

She and her husband are engaged with the occupation of breakfast and fast food center at her own home village. No doubt she has everything as per requirement of basic necessities of life: small but permanent income, a two-wheeler, a good shop and other allied items to manage her family. Still her family members are not happy. Why? Due to inavailability of a good RCC (reinforced concrete cement) owned house.

It doesn’t mean that they are staying in an open place or a thatched house. But they are staying at a rented house with a high rate of rent charged by the house owner. The rented house is made from mud and roofed with asbestos, which creates a very critical situation during rainy season. It is also very difficult to stay in during winter period. The most important thing is that the house is not completely secure and safe.

In this situation, Santilata decided to construct an RCC house for a better standard. She has already started to construct the house. But she is not having sufficient funds to complete it. So she decided to borrow a loan from any bank or other financial institution.

At this moment Santilata came to Mahashakti Foundation to know about house loan details. Mahashakti Foundation decided to disburse a loan for house construction.
 
She is very happy to know that her house will be complete within a few months. It not only reduces the financial burden but also helps Santilata to feel proud to have an owned house in the society.

loans.use: to complete plastering, flooring, coloring and wiring with electricity connection.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Kiz

texts.en:
Kiz lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with one child and she takes care of one additional family member. She makes Irish potatoes chips from the market at retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 3 years. She works seven days a week in the evenings only. 

She has requested for a loan of 300,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy cooking oil,a bag of Irish potatoes,cabbages. Her major challenge includes seasonality and transportation. 

Her goal and aspiration is to educate her children to university level. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil,a bag of Irish potatoes,cabbages.

loans.name: Ozodamo

texts.ru: Озодамо проживает в городе Куляб. Ей 30 лет. Она разведенная и у неё нет детей. Сейчас она живет в доме родителей. Озодамо благородная и искренняя женщина. Так как она в разводе, Озодамо чувствует себя обузой в доме родителей. Поэтому она решила сама зарабатывать на жизнь и быть финансово устойчивым человеком. Она начала шить традиционные национальные платья. Она аккуратно шьет, но, к сожалению, у неё очень старая швейная машинка, которая не в состоянии нормально работать. Однако Озодамо не потеряв надежду, решила обратиться за кредитом. Она очень верит, что с вашей помощью и великодушием она сможет купить новую швейную машинку и добиться успеха.
texts.en: Ozodamo lives in the city of Kulob. She is 30 and divorced with no children, and is currently living with her parents. She is a noble and sincere woman. Since she is divorced, Ozodamo feels that she is a burden in her parents house and therefore has decided to earn a living on her own and be a financially independent person. She started sewing traditional regional dresses. She is a good seamstress but unfortunately she has a very old sewing machine which isn't working properly. However, she hasn't lost hope, and has decided to apply for a loan. She truly believes that with your help and generosity she will be able to buy a new sewing machine and achieve success.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay workers who harvested maize.

loans.name: Denize

texts.en:
Denize is 30 years of age, a female, married with 4 children, 3 of whom are attending school. She owns a ladies beauty salon, working 6 days, 12 hours per day. She is dealing in women’s different hair styles, i.e. plaiting, and has been in business since 2004 with an aim of generating income. She is also a hardworking lady who deals in farming as a source of side income, though limited by capital which hinders her business growth.

She requests additional capital to buy more weaves, braids, shampoo, oils and treatments, thus expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy more weaves, braids, shampoo, oils and treatments, thus expanding her business.

loans.name: Colombus

texts.en:
Colombus is 42 years old and married, with  5 children, all of whom are attending school in Kasese, Uganda. He deals in a produce business that is selling dry beans plus maize, and earns his side income from farming activities. He works six days a week. 

He needs the money to buy beans and maize for selling. He is hardworking and honest but faces a challenge of limited capital.

loans.use: to buy beans and maize for selling.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.es:
Vanessa una joven con 21 años de edad, con una hija menor, trabajadora y humilde, dedicada a realizar labores de campo, gracias a la enseñanza de su madre, y por el medio en el cual ha logrado salir adelante.
 
Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, ya que con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando.

Solicito un préstamo en la Corporación Interactuar con el cual comprara un computador portátil para la ayuda y control de su negocio.

Usted puede hacer parte de este sueño, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Vanessa is a young 21 year-old woman with a young daughter.  She is hard-working and humble.  She works in agriculture, thanks to the training from her mother, and through this means she is able to get ahead. 

Her dream is to improve the condition of home, since over time it has been deteriorating. 

She is asking for a loan from Kiva's field partner Interactuar in order to purchase a laptop computer in order to help her with her agricultural business.  You can be part of this dream.  Make a loan.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop computer in order to help her with her agricultural business.

loans.name: Hosia

texts.en:
Hosia is 45 years old and married with 8 children; 4 are attending school. They are living in Kasese, Uganda. He deals in coffee buying and earns his side income from farming activities. He works 10 hrs a day and 6 days a week. He has been in business since 1985. 

He needs the money to buy coffee for selling and to increase his working capital. 

He is hardworking but faces a challenge of price fluctuations in agriculture products. He has a dream of expanding his business and establishing many branches.

loans.use: to buy coffee for selling

loans.name: Yokonia

texts.en:
Yokonia is 46 years old and married. He has 10 children, 5 of whom are attending school and living in Kasese, Uganda. He deals in shoe selling, working 12 hrs a day and 3 days in a week. He earns his side income from farming and a merchandise shop.  He has been in business for nine years. 

He needs the money to pay school fees for his children. 

He is hardworking but faces a problem of weather changes and inadequate capital. He has a dream of educating his children to university.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 33 years old. He is married with four children, two of whom are attending school and living in Kasese, Uganda. He has a butcher shop, working 12 hrs a day and 6 days in a week. He has been in business since 2006.  He earns his side income from a bar and farming. 

He needs the credit facility to buy house construction materials like sand and stones. 

He is hardworking but faces the the challenge of less capital. He has hopes of completing his residential house, rentals and educating his children.

loans.use: to buy house construction materials like sand and stones

loans.name: Yamira Bautista

texts.es:
Yamira es una joven estudiante de medicina, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativos, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Yamira, tengo 18 años de edad. Actualmente vivo en Hato del Yaque, D.M.  Nací en Santiago, pero crecí en un campo de Mao llamado Potrero. Tengo 1 hermano y 2 hermanas con los cuales vivo. Soy soltera. No tengo hijos. Solo vivo con mi madre y ella es Ama de casa.
Quiero estudiar en la Universidad Autónoma de Santo Domingo la carrera de Medicina porque desde muy pequeña me ha inspirado el ayudar a los demás. Ya empecé a estudiar, voy en mi segundo semestre. De las materias que he tomado mis favoritas son: Biología, Ciencias Sociales, Matemáticas y Orientación.
Para mi este préstamo seria de gran bendición, puesto que mis posibilidades económicas no son las mejores, sin embargo, si no recibiera el crédito, continuaría buscando otros medios para superarme y lograr mis sueños y objetivos, pero no desistiría. Yo creo que recibir una ayuda como esta cambiaria mucho mi vida, en cuanto al aspecto intelectual se refiere, y no solo mi vida sino también la de mi familia.
Mi más anhelada meta académica es poder graduarme con el más alto honor en la carrera que he elegido, y así poder ayudar a mis seres queridos a salir adelante; y en cuanto a mis metas personales y familiares, quisiera dentro de unos años, cuando ya esté preparada, poder formar mi propia familia nuclear. Después de terminar mi carrera lo que quiero es seguir esforzándome, pero ahora por desarrollarme y aplicar mis conocimientos para cuidar de mis pacientes, amigos y familiares. Es por eso que al terminar me gustaría trabajar en el sector público para ayudar a personas que se y conozco las circunstancias en las que viven.
texts.en:
Yamira is a young medical student.  She is asking for a loan in order to cover her educational expenses.  This is her story: 

"My name is Yamira.  I am 18 years old.  Currently I live in Hato del Yaque, Dominican Republic.  I was born in Santiago, but I grew up in the region of Mao called Potrero.  I have one brother and two sisters who live with me.  I am single.  I do not have children.  I live with my mother who is a housewife. 

I want to study at the Autonomous University of Santo Domingo and pursue a degree in Medicine because from the time I was young I have been inspired by helping others.  I have already begun my studies.  I am in my second semester.  Of the classes I have taken my favorites are Biology, Social Science, Math and Orientation. 

This loan would be a great blessing for me, since my economic options are not the best.  However, if I do not receive a loan, I will continue to look for other methods to get ahead and achieve my dreams and objectives.  I will not stop.  I believe that receiving help like this would change my life considerably, giving me intellectual space and helping not only my life but also that of my family.   

My greatest academic goal is to be able to graduate with high honors in the career I have chosen, and thus be able to help my loved ones get ahead.  As far as my personal and family goals, I would like, within a few years once I have my degree, to be able to start my own family.  After finishing my career I want to continue working hard, but for now I need to develop my own skills and apply my knowledge to care for my patients, friends and families. For this reason I would like to work in the public sector and help people that I know and with whose circumstances I am familiar."

loans.use: to cover education expenses.

loans.name: Leidy Yohana

texts.es:
Leidy una joven con 25 años de edad, soltera y con dos hijos de 1 y 7 años, dedicada al trabajo de  la cría de aves, lo cual lo aprendió viendo a su madre, y por el medio que hoy día ha logrado salir adelante.

Su sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su casa para así brindarles una mejor estabilidad a sus hijos.

Con el préstamo solicitado comprara pollos y cuido al por mayor, así sus ventas mejoraran.

Su préstamo ayudara a Leidy a invertir en un mejor futuro para su familia.
texts.en:
Leidy is 25 years old, single and has two children who are 1 and 7 years old. Her occupation is raising poultry.  She learned this trade by watching her mother, and it has allowed her to get ahead.

Her dream is to improve her house so that she can provide more stability for her children.  With the loan she is applying for she will buy chickens and feed at wholesale which will increase her sales. Her loan will help Leidy to invest in a better future for her family.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed at wholesale.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a budding entrepreneur. She and her father George, who is also her mentor, run several businesses jointly. One of them has been four Fresh Life Toilets in Nairobi’s Makadara area; it has been Margaret’s source of employment for the last two years.

Being a single mother, this business has not only helped provide a source of livelihood for her and her son, but also helped champion sanitation in the Maringo area within Makadara.

As she says, there are currently fewer flying toilets along pathways and businesspeople now have access to hygienic toilet services at all times.

Margaret has learned great entrepreneurial skills from her father; she is now confident she can run her own enterprises.

Her current goal is to acquire two Fresh Life Toilets to scale up their toilet businesses and ultimately serve more community members in the Makadara area.

loans.use: To pay for two Fresh Life Toilets.

loans.name: Ainura

texts.ru: Айнура, 41 год, замужем, 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, уже 15 лет в качестве дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 2,0 ГА поливной земли, где она выращивает пшеницу и клевер. Также есть 36 ящиков пчелосемей. Айнура известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 7,600 сом (KGS). поэтому она решила развить свою деятельность и обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), который направит на покупку 2 тонн сахара для пчеловодства и производства экологически чистого меда. Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и улучшение материального положения семьи.
texts.en: Ainura is 41 years old, married, and has three children. She has a secondary education. She has been farming for fifteen years to get income. She has two cows and 2.0 hectares of irrigated land where she grows wheat and clover. She also has 36 beehives. Ainura is well known as a principled, honest, decent and dependable person. Today her business brings her a monthly income of 7,600 som (KGS). For this reason she has decided to develop her business and has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) which she will direct to the purchase of two tons of sugar for bee-keeping and the production of organic honey. She plans to use the proceeds of the loan to develop her business and improve the material position of her family.

loans.use: to buy two tons of sugar for the development of her organic honey production business.

loans.name: Jeannett Veronica

texts.es:
Jeannett es una mujer de 29 años de edad, soltera, tiene 1 hijo de 10 años, y su negocio es el servicio de pintura en exteriores.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, amable, generosa, optimista, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en 2 ciudades vecinas; La Paz y El Alto, caracterizadas por estar situadas a una altura encima de los 3600 metros sobre el nivel del mar, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre -2/12 grados centígrados.
Jeannett es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello castaño claro largo peinado a la moda, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que desarrolla. Su vida la realiza con su hijo que estudia en la escuela, viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es el servicio de pintado a casas y edificios con motivos andinos; los motivos andinos se caracterizan por sus tonos fuertes y coloridos, siguiendo un simbolismo que hace referencia al sol, dicha actividad fue transmitida por su padre que se dedica al mismo negocio, “mi trabajo se caracteriza por el uso de colores intensos como se ve en los tejidos típicos de la región…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que la pintura con motivos andinos se encuentra en auge, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de máquinas para pintar. Su sueño es abrir una empresa constructora, ella desea realiza la compra de un soplete industrial para pintar. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Jeannett solicita un préstamo para la compra de una soplete industrial para pintar edificios con motivos andinos y formar una empresa.
texts.en:
Jeannett is a 29 year old woman. She is single and has 1 ten year old son. Her business is painting exteriors. She is a good mother, enterprising, kind, generous, optimist, responsible and very hardworking. She operates her business in two neighboring cities, La Paz and El Alto. They are characterized  by being at an altitude higher than 3,600 meters above sea level, with a cold and dry climate with a daytime temperature that varies during the day between -2/12 degrees centigrade.

Jeannett has dark skin, brown eyes, long, fashionably styled light, brown hair, short stature and a medium build. Her mother tongue is Aymará, which she speaks in her family, and she speaks Spanish in the general culture and in her business. She shares her life with her son, who is in school. They live in a family owned house built from brick and cement with a sheet metal roof. It has potable water, electricity and plumbing. Her business is a house painting service with Andean motifs for houses and buildings. Andean motifs are characterized by their strong and colorful tones, following a symbolism that makes reference to the sun. She learned this activity from her father, who works at the same business. “My work is characterized by the use of intense colors, as can be seen on the traditional weavings from the area...," she remarks. The advantage of the business is that painting with Andean motifs is on the rise. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to buy machines to paint with. Her dream is to open a construction business. She wants to buy an industrial sprayer to paint with. This is her first loan cycle with the institution during the 10 years she has been doing this activity.

These are the reasons that Jeannett is asking for a loan to buy an industrial sprayer to paint buildings with Andean designs and start a company.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sprayer to paint buildings with Andean motifs and start a company.

loans.name: Las Margaritas Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS MARGARITAS, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convención, distrito de Huayopata y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Soledad  tiene 61 años de edad es soltera  y tiene 04 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma segur apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de gaseosas entre otros.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Soledad belongs to the communal banking group Las Margaritas.  The bank is located in the Province of La Convención, in the district of Huayopata and the department of Cusco.  

Soledad is 61 years old and is single.  She has 4 children.  She runs a grocery store selling rice, sugar, milk and other items.  She has been working in the business for a long time and things are going well thanks to the efforts that she puts forth each day.  She wants to be able to continue working and in this way support her family.  

She is asking for a loan in order to purchase soft drinks among other items.  

The group members of this bank are thankful for Kiva lenders and promise to comply with the established loan repayment plans.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and other items.

loans.name: Raso

texts.en:
Raso is an energetic woman of 42 years who lives in a small mud house with her family in a small village of Alipurduar district in West Bengal. She is the mother of four children (three sons and one daughter). Three of her children go to school and one is involved with income-generating work. 
	
Raso’s husband, Raben, aged 51 years, is engaged with agribusiness. They give their hard toil to grow good-quality products to satisfy their customers and, at the same time, earn for the family. Now they have decided to grow jute in their farmland, as it has good market demand. They want to grow their agribusiness, but the main obstacle is capital.

Raso has come to know about BJS (Kiva’s partner) and taken a loan from them. She will invest the loan in buying high-yield seeds, fertilizers, manure and other necessary farm supplies to grow jute. She hopes profit generated from the business will give better living conditions to her family and she can provide better education to her children. Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies for jute cultivation.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a 26 year old from the community of Badian, Bohol. She is a mother with a two year old son and her husband is a carpenter. Grace has been support her son by operating a Sari-sari store (variety store) business for a year now. She sell toiletries, canned goods, noodles, eggs, and seasoning. 

She is asking for a loan of PHP6000 to buy additional stocks of shampoo, bath soap, coffee, cooking oil, biscuits, and canned goods. Her income provides food for her family. In the future, she hopes to have a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, bath soap, coffee, cooking oil, biscuits, and canned goods

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of three children ages 14, 17 and 20. She is from Ronda, Cebu. She runs a sari-sari, or variety store, selling various goods to the people of her community. 

Virginia is asking for a loan to buy more canned goods, noodles, biscuits, soap, shampoo, and other items to sell. With this loan, Virginia will be able to attract more buyers to her store, thus increasing her sales and income. As a doting mother to her children, she only wish that they can finish their studies so they can have a good life in the future.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, biscuits, soap and shampoo

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with 4 children and all attend school and she takes care of one additional family member. She operates a boutique selling second hand clothes. She has been in this business for the last 2 years. She gets additional income from selling snacks and works seven days a week. 

She has requested for a loan of 300,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy bales of second hand clothes. Her major challenge includes seasonality and transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to build permanent business premises. She lives in rented house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes to sell to support her family

loans.name: Remegia

texts.en:
Remegia is a 36 year old woman from Ronda, Cebu. She has been running a sari-sari store for five years now, selling various goods to the people in the community. Remegia also sell clothes that are affordable like shirts, skirts, Sunday dress, and rice. 

She wants to expand her business but lacks the financial resources to do so. She is requesting a loan to buy more stock to sell such as noodles, canned goods, biscuits, soap, shampoo, 3 sacks of rice, t-shirts and shorts. Through this, she will be able to attract more customers to her store, thus increasing her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy noodles, canned goods, biscuits, soap, shampoo, 3 sacks of rice, t-shirts and shorts

loans.name: Kalpana

texts.en:
Kalpana, a very young woman of only 26 years, lives with her husband and two sons in the small village of Dalimpur in Falakata. She studied up to grade 8, but her husband is an illiterate who can sign his name only. Both of her sons are too young to attend school.

Kalpana's husband, Pradip, works as a farmer in the village to earn for the family's livelihood. He has been engaged in agricultural activities for many years. Kalpana, being a housewife, manages the household and looks after her family. After managing her household work, she helps her husband in his farm work. They sell their harvested produce in the local markets. The major part of their locality is covered with agricultural land, and paddy (rice), being a staple, is cultivated widely in the region. So, they have to face competitors in the market. 

The income generated from paddy cultivation is insufficient to support her family. Kalpana wants to increase the productivity, but she lacks capital. 

For this reason, she is seeking a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner). She will use the loan to buy better quality paddy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for a good quality product. She hopes the loan will enable her to earn more to provide a better education to her children, and with the profit, she can purchase more cultivable lands.

She is thankful for BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs like seeds, fertilizers and other necessary farm resources for cultivation of paddy.

loans.name: Shyamali

texts.en:
Twenty-two-year-old Shyamali lives in a small village of Falakata. She is married to Prahlad, and together, they are raising their one daughter with love and care. Her daughter is too young for school. 

Dynamic and hard-working, Shyamali’s husband is running a business of growing seasonal vegetables. Though a housewife, Shyamali also helps her husband in every way, especially at the time of harvesting and selling their products to the local markets. Due to the seasonal nature of his job, his income is unsteady and insufficient for the family's household.  

Now they have decided to cultivate paddy (rice) in their farmland. They are confident that they will be able to increase their monthly income with this cultivation, as paddy is a staple food in West Bengal and it is an all-season crop that has a high demand in the market. They are looking for a loan to purchase necessary agricultural supplies.

Shyamali has applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner). She wants to utilize the loan to purchase good quality paddy seeds and fertilizers and to bear the operational cost for paddy cultivation. The business profit will help Shyamali to keep her family afloat and stable financially. 

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva for their financial help.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies and to bear operational costs for paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Shephali

texts.en:
Shephali is a 51-year-old, married lady with four children (three sons and one daughter). She lives in a small village named Raychenga in Alipurduar district with her family. Her sons are engaged with different income-generating work, and her daughter has married.  

The main income for the family comes from agriculture. Shephali's husband, 56-year-old Sudhir, is engaged in agribusiness. He cultivates different seasonal crops and sells them in the market at a wholesale price. Shephali also helps her husband in cultivation activities after managing her household chores. They now want to cultivate chilies on their farmland, as chilies have a good market all over in India.

In order to yield a good harvest, Shephali applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to buy good fertilizers, seeds and other farm supplies to grow chilies in bulk. She wants to increase her income and provide her family with a good life.

She is grateful to her generous lenders.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds and other farm supplies for chili cultivation.

loans.name: Emilio De Jesus

texts.es:
Emilio un señor de 52 años, casado con cuatro hijos de 12, 17 ,20 y 24 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar en una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar en Gomez Plata.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando y así mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Solicito un crédito en la Corporación Interactuar para abastecer su negocio comprando cervezas, helados, mecato y otros.

Quiere seguir creciendo y expandir su negocio, con su apoyo Emilio podrá seguir su sueño.
texts.en:
Emilio is a 52-year-old man, married with four children of 12, 17, 20, and 24 years of age. He makes a living working in a convenience store in Gomez Plata.

His dream is to continue working and in this way improve his living conditions. 

He applied for a loan with the Corporación Interactuar to stock his business buying beer, ice cream, cakes, etc.

He wants to continue growing and expanding his business, with his helper Emilio he will be able to follow his dream.

loans.use: to buy beer, ice cream, cakes, etc.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana un joven con 21 años de edad, trabajadora y humilde, dedicada a realizar trabajos de campo desde hace poco, lo cual lo aprendió de su pareja actual y le ha permitido tener un gran progreso.

Su sueño es comprar una vivienda propia y así tener una vida más estable.

Con el crédito ella comprara entables y hectáreas de caña, ya que por motivos de lluvias fuertes muchas de estas se la han dañado. Con esto espera aumentar las ventas.

Con su apoyo diana podrá seguir este sueño.
texts.en:
Diana is a 21 year old woman. She is hardworking and humble. She has been doing farm work for a short time. She learned it from her now spouse and it has allowed her to progress a lot. 

Her dream is to own her own home and thus have a more stable life. 

With the loan, she will buy fields and hectares of sugarcane because due to heavy rains, a lot of hers have been ruined. With this, she hopes to increase her sales. 

With your support, Diana can continue with her dream.

loans.use: to buy fields and hectares of sugarcane to increase her sales.

loans.name: Rayan Faliya Mahila Mandal Group

texts.en:
Manjulaben is a 40-year-old mother of five children who leads this group of five from Dahod, Gujarat, in India. Her household income is 17,000 INR, which is insufficient to meet the household expenses and pay for the children's education. Her monthly savings are just 4,000 INR. Hence Manjulaben thought of starting her own business to supplement the family's income. She started selling vegetables which sells which include tomatoes, potatoes, cabbage, cauliflowers, onions, ginger etc With this business she is currently earning 6,000 INR, but she wants to earn more to support her children's education. 

Manjulaben is seeking to avail a loan to expand her business. The other women are determined to help their families and want to expand their existing businesses as well. These families earn on average 10,000 INR per month, out of which they are able to save only 2,000 INR. Similar to Manjulaben, the other women too, pursue such small businesses. Together, the group seeks a loan of 50,000 INR. They will use the loan to expand their business. 

Your loan will help these women earn more and give a good education to their children. It will also pave the way for a good standard of living and happiness among these families.

loans.use: To expand her vegetable selling business

loans.name: Mwansiti

texts.en: Mwansiti is a 20-year-old entrepreneur, living with her child in the Pangani district. She requests a Kiva loan in order to launch her women’s clothing business. She plans to use the profit she earns to support her parents' daily needs. She also volunteers as a Camfed Learner Guide, leading life skills sessions for students in the nearby secondary school. Mwansiti’s dream is to assist vulnerable children in her community.

loans.use: to launch her women’s clothing business

loans.name: José Ángel

texts.es: José tiene 31 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 8 meses y 1 año de edad. José es un hombre emprendedor que trabaja como agricultor y además labora como ayudante en una ladrillera cercana a su vivienda desde hace varios años, gracias a su esfuerzo a podido sacar adelante a su familia brindándoles todo lo necesario para sobrevivir día con día.  José anteriormente adquirió un crédito que invirtió en la compra de cemento, arena, piedra y ladrillo para la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio  pero el monto otorgado no fue suficiente para terminar la obra completamente  por lo que José ha decidido solicitar un nuevo crédito a FUSAI y con el monto  poder invertir en la compra de: cemento, arena, hierro, lamina, puertas y ventanas  para terminar la construcción de su cuarto dormitorio y de esta manera  mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: José is 31 years old. He lives in his own home with his life's companion and their two children, aged 8 months and 1 year. José is an enterprising man who works as a farmer. He has also worked as an assistant at a brick factory close to his home for several years. Thanks to his hard work, he has been able to get his family ahead, giving them everything they need to survive day to day. Perviously,  José acquired a loan that he invested in cement, sand, stone and bricks to build a bedroom, nut the amount wasn't enough to finish the work completely. That is why José has decided to ask for a new loan from FUSAI, and with the amount be able to invest in buying cement, sand, iron, metal sheeting, doors and windows to finish construction on his bedroom and in this way improve his and his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, metal sheeting, doors and windows to finish construction on a bedroom.

loans.name: Kennedy
